Error resilience in wireless video transmission 5. cross layer resource allocation 6.802.11 7. ad hoc and sensor network8. WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN 9. IoT and other recent advances

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線理論 2. 等量傳輸網路之合成 3. 集體元件微波電路 4. 半集總濾波電路之合成 5. 耦合傳輸線之物理參數 6. 耦合傳輸線濾波器 7. 指狀濾波器 8. 梳型濾波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line theory2.Synthesis of commensurate line networks3.Lumped element microwave circuits4.Synthesis of semi-lumped filter curcuits5.Physical parameters of coupled lines6.Coupled lines filter7.Interdigital filter8.Combline filter

description.zh: 本課程包含：1. 散射參數與網路分析儀 2. 頻譜儀介紹 3. 自動化量測 4. 平面化傳輸線 5. 射頻集總元件與阻抗匹配 6. 積體電路封裝 7. 射頻耦合器 8. 射頻濾波器學生能從這門課學習到射頻被動元件的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.S-parameter and Network Analyzer2.Introduction to Spectrum Analyzer3.Automatic Measurement4.Planar Transmission Lines5.RF Lump Elements and Impedance Matching6.IC Package7.RF Coupler8.RF FilterThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF passive circuits from this course.

notes: 電子所日職合開

description.zh: 1. 固體結晶結構 2. 能隙與載子 3. 載子傳輸 4. 過量載子 5. P-N 接面 6. 金半接面及半導體異質接面 7. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 8. 雙極電晶體
description.en: 1. Crystal Structure of Solids2. Energy Bands and Charge Carriers3. Carrier Transport4. Excess Carriers5. P-N Junctions6. Metal-Semiconductor and Semiconductor Heterojunstions7. Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Field Effect Transistor (MOSFET)8. Bipolar Transistor

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解施工安全衛生的重要，熟悉有關知識及緊急措施，從而增加處變之因應能力。內容包括施工安全衛生組織，事故調查分析，風險評估與安全管理，施工安全和衛生設備，安全經費編列與執行，新穎的風險評估及安全管理方法與研究等。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the students the concept of the importance of construction safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of construction safety, analysis of accidents, risk assessment and safety management, construction safety and facilities, safety outlay and implementation, current research and novel techniques for risk assessment and safety management and so on.

description.zh: 本課程將以 BIM 之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討 BIM 之設計與實作，希望學生能夠經由防救災或工程管理之需求分析開始，瞭解 BIM 建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而設計一個 BIM 在防救災與管理之實務應用，其內容包括：BIM 自動化防救災應用，BIM 實務應用，國內外 BIM 案例探討，BIM 應用之分析與設計，BIM 系統設計與開發，BIM 系統在防救災與工程管理之應用等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for applications disaster prevention and management recently. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, development, and related applications for disaster prevention and engineering management. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments, a midterm report and a final project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related applications suitable to their own researches to meet disaster prevention or engineering management requirement.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型與防救災及工程管理
name.en: Applications of Building Information Modeling for Disaster Prevention and Engineering Management

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間) 運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

notes: 車輛四、日、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論，線性規劃法，非線性規劃法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規劃法介紹，精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

notes: 英文授課，日職車輛、能源、機電博、能源與車輛外生合

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
description.en: This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一) 儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二) 儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 碩一

description.zh: 本課程在導引學生了解教師專業的相關概念與理論，協助學生探究教師專業的基本素養與評量標準，以及教師生涯各階段專業發展的再精進策略。
description.en: This course is to guide students to understand the relevant concepts and theories on teacher professionals；to explore the basic literacy of teachers and assessment of professional criteria；to investigate  the successful strategies of professional development for teachers in different career stages.

notes: 日夜合開

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

notes: 共同 302 教室

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

notes: 共同 302 教室

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；課程重點包括認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派之分析、學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢等。
description.en: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.

notes: 共同 302 教室

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

notes: 共同 302 教室

description.zh: （一）瞭解生涯規劃與經營的理論及實務；（二）探討生涯規劃與經營模式；（三）應用生涯規劃與經營模式。課程內容包括：生涯規劃與生涯管理的定義、內涵與功能、生涯探究指引、生涯目標設定、生涯策略、生涯評估、生涯管理議題、人力資源支持系統及組織生涯管理系統。
description.en: The course arms to (1) Understand the theory and application Of career planning and management. (2) Explore the model of career planning and management. (3) Apply the career planning and management model. It covers the definition, essence, and function of career planning and management, a guide to career exploration, career goal setting, career strategies, career appraisal, and contemporary issues in career management, human resource support system, and organizational career management system.

name.en: Career Planning and Management for Employees

notes: 共同 302 教室

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

notes: 共同 411 教室

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

notes: 共同 411 教室，日夜合開

description.zh: 探討數位學習方法與策略。內容包括情境學習、建構學習、合作學習、社會學習、自律學習、自我導向學習、專題學習、問題導向學習等。
description.en: To explore e-learning methods and strategies including situated learning, constructivist learning, cooperative learning, socil learning, self-regulated learning, self-directed learning, project-based learning, problem-based learning etc...

notes: 共同 411 教室

description.zh: 探討網路專題與問題導向學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習專題與問題導向之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、環境、教師教學、學生學習、評量、實際案例、未來趨勢。
description.en: To explore  advanced issues on Web project-based and problem-based learning including their theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, teacher teaching,student learning, assessment, practical cases, and future treand etc...

name.zh: 網路專題與問題導向學習
name.en: Special Topic on Web Project-Based & Problem-Based Learning

notes: 共同 411 教室

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the vocational education related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

notes: 碩二，共同 411 教室

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 課程與教學

notes: 共同 303C 教室

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 班級經營

notes: 共同 303C 教室

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎 (a) 輸送現象 (b) 高分子黏彈學 (c) 高分子混煉。(II) 高分子加工學之應用 (a) 壓模法 (b) 沖模法 (c) 反應沖模法 (d) 絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

notes: 徐嘉偉

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray 等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子？電路成像高分子？光電子成像材料？最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB 薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有 (1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論 (2) 界面的作用力 (3) 表面及界面的熱力學 (4) 液體和固體界面的熱力學 (5) 表面及界面張力的測量 (6) 接觸角的測量 (7) 吸附的熱力學 (8) 分散液的穩定性 (9) 分散液分子間吸力及斥力 (10) 懸浮液之高分子穩定性 (11) 凝聚 (12) 界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 課程從統計模式 (迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一。孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二。家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三。醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四。日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

notes: 與其他科系合上

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項・
description.en: This course has provided: money and capital market、Investments 、How to obtaining and using funds、Maximize the value o their firms、How to maximize stockholders' stock、To know agency problem 、To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy.

description.zh: 本課程是針對高科技產業行銷管理的進階課程，目的是以行銷管理理論及案例討論方式，幫助學生熟悉高科技產業分析與行銷管理策略。關鍵概念包括傳統的行銷管理、高新技術產業 B2B 行銷管理、高科技導論、高科技企業之策略與企業文化、關係行銷、高科技企業之市場導向及研發與行銷的互動、高科技市場的行銷研究、了解高科技市場之顧客、高科技市場之後配銷通路與供應鏈管理、高科技市場之定價考量、高科技市場之廣告及促銷、及電子化企業及電子商務等研討。
description.en: This is an advanced course in marketing management for high-tech firms. The objective is to help students become familiar with industrial analysis and marketing management through marketing theories and cases. The key concepts include traditional marketing management, B2B Marketing Management, the introduction of high-tech Industry marketing, high-tech company's strategy and culture, relation marketing, marketing-R&D interaction, marketing research in high-tech markets, understanding high-tech customers, distribution channels and supply chain management, pricing consideration on high-tech marketing, advertising and promotion, E-business, case study, and term project.

name.zh: 科技政策與國家競爭力

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

notes: 職碩一必修；設計 106；新聘

description.zh: Brundtland 報告在 1987 年將永續發展定義為「在不損害後代子孫滿足其自身需求的能力的前提下滿足當前需求的發展。」17 個永續發展目標依循千禧年共同訂定發展目標的成功基礎上延展，其中包括諸如氣候變化，經濟不平等，創新，可持續消費，和平與正義等新領域。17 個永續發展目標更於 2016 年 1 月成為聯合國致力發展推動政策及生效直至 2030 年。本課程旨在探討研究「永續發展」新概念和理論基礎。課程論述著重於工業化國家（尤其是台灣地區）的永續性問題，例如人口老齡化，可持續消費等。課程中透過創新產品設計與開發方法來系統化引導學生探索有關可持續性，經濟和技術層面以及相關知識社會學，並嘗試帶領學生提出具可行性的新產品、系統及服務概念，為當前狀態下提供更好的友善環境解決方案。課程期待學生透過修習該課程，應可以掌握跨學科永續發展的設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計和開發方法來引導不同永續相關背景和設計背景的專業人員合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之環境友善產品之關鍵課題，針對環境需求，提出創新友善環境解決方案並進而產生創新環境友善產品。
description.en: Sustainable development is defined by Brundtland Report (1987) as “development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.” There are 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) build on the successes of the Millennium Development Goals, while including new areas such as climate change, economic inequality, innovation, sustainable consumption, peace and justice, among other priorities. The 17 SDGs came into effect in January 2016, and they will continue to guide UNDP policy and funding until 2030. This course aims to explore alternative conceptions and theoretical underpinnings of the notion of “sustainable development.” It focuses on the sustainability problems of industrial countries, especially in Taiwan such as aging of populations, sustainable consumption, etc. It intends to use IPDD approach systematically to explore the sociology of knowledge around sustainability, the economic and technological dimensions a

notes: 日職碩、博合開；設計 207

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW) 是 UDDC 華冑設計整合美國 GE 公司、IDEO 公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法，以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值，帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。 使用者導向的情境體驗法，為 21 世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives. Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions. Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysis Design Feature Attribute Mapping (Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

notes: 大學部上限 10 / 日碩博上限 20 / 職碩上限 12, 一教 1F, 創創

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 探討非均相觸媒應用於環境領域中之反應原理、反應動力學並進一步分析觸媒製造技術。
description.en: This course will involve mainly the theories, characterization techniques and applications of HETEROGENEOUS CATALYSIS in Environmental Science field..

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 1. 實體模型設計簡介與應用 2. 實體模型設計軟體功能與使用者介面之簡介 (簡介構成軟體的各項模組) 3. 建構繪圖環境 (訂置繪圖工具列與草圖顯示內容) 4. 建構參考幾何 (繪製草圖，尺寸標註、產生基準面、曲線、曲面等) 5. 使用特徵 (填料、除料、伸長、掃出、旋轉… 等的使用) 6. 組件的繪製 (特徵編輯，處理組件的組態…) 7. 組合件的處理 (處理方式、產生組合件、爆炸圖、模型組態、於零組件中註記) 8. 鈑金零件 9. 熔接 10. 工程圖的處理 (訂製工程圖範本、產生工程圖、組件與組合件的視圖) 11. 模型外觀的處理 (材質、顏色、光源) 12. 輸出與輸入檔案的處理
description.en: 1.	Introduction and Applications of solid modeling2.Introduction of functions and user interface of software for solid modeling3.Create working environoment4.Reference geometry5.Using features6.Working with parts7.Working with assemblies8.Sheet metal9.Weldments10.Create engineering drawing11.Out-looking treatment (materials, color, light source,…)12.Importing and Exporting files

name.zh: 電腦整合實體模型設計

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 限碩一選課

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡：包括物質本性，化學熱力學，化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化：包括化學反應速率與動力學，分子反應動力學，表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

description.zh: 在推動國家經濟發展，提升環境保護和創造國家競爭力，政府對於科技政策之擬定，及科技經費之持續支持十分重要，並以此培植科技人才、將科技研發成果加以推廣。為確保有限之科技資源能夠發揮其最高之效用，建立客觀及公正之績效評估制度實屬必要。本課程擬以最近影響人類生活環境甚巨之全球暖化現象 (Global Warming)，及其引發之綠能科技投資為例，探討綠能科技政策之擬訂，以及綠能產業經濟分析。綠色能源包括風能、太陽能、生質能、氫能與燃料電池、地熱能、海洋能與淨煤技術，發展綠能產業即具備「3E」平衡發展之功效，已成各國追求之目標。本課程預計將涵蓋以下主題：�X 替代能源介紹（包括生質能源，如生質柴油與酒精汽油，以及氫能與燃料電池等）�X 再生能源介紹（包括太陽能、風能、水力發電、地熱及海洋能等）�X 二氧化碳捕捉與封存、淨煤專題�XLED 專題等
description.en: Many scientists conclude that the increased greenhouse effect is already accelerating global warming and leading to the climate change. Worldwide government are taking measures to tackle this issue and outlining strategies to bring the greenhouse effect under control.Greenhouse gas emissions in Taiwan are mainly from burning fossil fuels such as crude oil, coal and LPG and the energy imports have reached 99.22%. Therefore, the sustainable development in any country is to increase the proportion of self-generation of energy, reduce the emission of GHGs, and balance among Economic Growth, Environment Protection and Energy Supply.Green energy (Renewable energy) covers the fields of solar and wind energy, biofuels which includes biodiesel and bioethanol, hydrogen energy and fuel cell, geothermal and ocean energy as well as clean coal combustion technologies (IGCC). Balancing development of '3E' can be achieved by developing green energy industries and which is also the goal every count

name.zh: 綠能產業政策與經濟分析
name.en: Industrial Policy of Green Energy and Economic Analysis

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程主要以實務案例之解析為內容，並結合商標法理論剖析之教學方式，來深入介紹我國商標實務上之重要爭議，讓同學了解司法實務中，如何具體適用法律、判決或學說等。此外，本課程亦將分別介紹國外相關學說理論及著名司法案例，期望同學透過本課程之修習，來培養對國內外商標法案例思辨及評析之能力。
description.en: Primary contents of this course are focused on case analyses, and its teaching method is trademark legal theories analyses in order to further introduce significant disputes about Taiwan trademark practices. Thus, students could understand how to concretely apply laws, precedents, or theories to judicial practices. In addition, this course will also introduce relevant foreign theories and well-known judicial cases to develop students’ abilities of examining and analyzing domestic/foreign trademark cases when students take this course.

notes: 先鋒 1401 教室，適合碩一，日職合開，英語授課

description.zh: 本課程將介紹歐盟專利法規，課程重點將以歐盟專利公約為主，並將包含歐州專利局的上訴委員會的案例。此外，相關歐盟會員國的專利案件也將於本課程中介紹。本課程每週將指定閱讀教材，修習本課同學，須先自行研讀，並參與每週課堂中的討論。
description.en: The course will provide an introductory overview of the regulations of European patents. The emphasis will be on the substantive law under the European Patent Convention, including the jurisprudence of the EPO Board of Appeals. In addition, relevant cases decided by members of EPC will be addressed.

notes: 先鋒 1401 教室

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1. 專利權利項解讀 2. 專利侵權分析流程 3. 專利迴避設計要件 4. 專利策略分析 5. 專利佈局實務 6. 案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

name.zh: 專利佈局與專利策略專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Portfolio and Patent Strategy

notes: 先鋒 1402 教室

description.zh: 本課程主要為台灣專利申請之文件，其相關的主題包括：專利之檢索、專利文件之閱讀，以及專利申請書、說明書、申請專利範圍與圖示等之撰寫。
description.en: This course focuses on the prosecution for Taiwan’s patents. The topics will include patent search, reading and drafting about patent specification, claims, figures and son on.

notes: 先鋒 1402 教室，適合碩一

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and appro92hes, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

notes: 限本系生修，上限 15 人

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of inter92tion design, inter92tive media and inter92tive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design pr92tice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of inter92tive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of inter92tive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a inter92tive media design project.

name.en: Special Topics on Inter92tive Media Design (II)

notes: 限本系生修，上限 15 人

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹聲音設計與電子音樂的製作技巧，透過介紹音訊編輯的技術、相關聲音設計工具的使用，學習創意的聲音設計與電子音樂製作。課程當中，除了聲音設計的工具介紹之外，並教導學生使用 Ableton Live 序列器軟體，搭配 Max for Live 的聲音設計工具，讓使用者可以在序列器中使用自己所設計的軟體合成器與數位位效果器，進而可延伸至多媒體、遊戲、新媒體展演等之音樂與音效應用。
description.en: This course mainly introduces sound design and electronic music production tools and skills. Through the introduction of audio editing technology and the use of related sound design tools, students can learn creative sound design. In the course, students are taught to use the Ableton Live sequencer software, combined with its sound design tools in Max for Live, to design their own software synthesizers and digital effects to be used in the sequencer. These skills may be used in multimedia design, game audio, new media performances, and etc.

notes: 限 20 人，需自備筆電 & 耳機，日職合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: 限 30 人，日職合開

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 日碩 / 職碩二 / 資工系合開

description.zh: 希望朝著技術訓練、實際運用與實驗性創作，三個層面進行課程上的交織鋪陳。在虛擬成像的關鍵技術上給予學生 3D 物件創作及影像合成的知識，並獲得自行研發與創造視覺效果的能力。在熟悉 3d 創作工具的同時，利用軟體本身多元並高度的掌控性，重組物理世界的運行法則，利用像是重力、碰撞、光影、質感等，並企圖創造出各種感知進化的契機。
description.en: By utilizing technical training, practical application and experimental creations as three aspects for intertwining in this courses. To offer the 3D object creation and image synthesis as the key techniques of virtual imaging for students knowledge development, and access to the ability of self researching and development for creating visual effects.While familiar this creative methods, using software itself as highly diverse controlling tools to reorganizing the rules of the physical world , such as gravity, collision, light, texture, etc., and attempting to create a variety of perceptual evolutionary opportunity.

notes: 限 30 人，學生自備筆電

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-1 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)，集中上課

description.zh: 近年來企業為面對市場的競爭與快速改變，其多以大型專案方式同時來執行幾個專案，如：產品研發、行銷規劃、生產製造及教育訓練等專案活動。大型專案管理要如何才能在企業統一的願景和策略下展開，來提升企業的競爭優勢與創造價值。因大型專案的時程較長且範圍較多，其不確定性和混淆性也較高，以致其成功的關鍵除須具備專案的執行的效率外，還須具有在於對變化的反應能力。本課程內容將著重於介紹大型專案規劃流程中所使用的技能與工具說明外，並安排學生企業內大型專案實務案例做為課堂內探討。其目的在訓練學生如何面對高混淆性和高不確定性的大型專案，使企業內大型專案管理有系統的方法執行與圓滿完成。
description.en: Recently, in order to face the challenges and rapid changes of the competition, enterprises often need have a large-scale project to execute several projects at the same time, such as product development, marketing planning, manufacturing, and education and training. How can large-scale project management be carried out under the unified vision and strategy of the enterprise? New capabilities and cultural consensus are needed to enhance the enterprise's competitive advantage and create value. Due to the long duration and large scope of large-scale project, its uncertainty and confusion are also high, so that the key to its success must be not only the efficiency of project execution, but also the ability to respond to changes.This course will focus on introducing the skills and tools used in the large-scale project, and arranging large-scale project practical cases in student companies as classroom discussions. Its purpose is to train students how to deal with large-scale project wit

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理，莊淳淩 (0.5 )

description.zh: 1. 建立企業經營策略的基本認知 2. 學習企業經營轉型與創新策略 3. 分享企業經營策略案例 4. 提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1. Establish basic understanding of business management2. Learn business transformation and innovative strategies3. Share cases of enterprise management strategies4. Promote student’s management ability

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (聯輔會) 台北上課 (關聯群 4)

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹管理個案的寫作與研究方法，藉由各種量化和質性的方法，如 EXCEL 及 SPSS 程式語言等分析個案資料，結合理論與實務，發掘、陳述、分析個案，以設計和實施單一個案研究和撰寫管理個案。
description.en: This course introduces the writing and research methods of management cases. It analyzes case data through various quantitative and qualitative methods, such as EXCEL and SPSS programming language. The course combines theory and practice, and discovers, presents and analyzes cases to design and implement a single case study and writing a management case.

name.en: Management Case Writing and Research Methods

notes: A 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1) 台北集中上課

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1) 集中上課

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1) 領導的基本概念；(2) 中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3) 領導的案例研究；(4) 領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

notes: (群組 4) 行銷管理

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理 (關聯群 7)

description.zh: 本行為經濟專題課程: 1.	介紹全球總體經濟以及政經情勢探討：從消費、投資、政府支出、進口、出口、外匯、利率、失業率、政府政策、地理位置等方面來分析經濟行為以及決策行為。2.	介紹管理者或一般大眾在作決策時，會產生的心理偏誤。另外，也提供管理者或一般大眾如何避孼心理偏誤，並改善其決策程序，以心理學的角度來探討。3.	從總體經濟數據中，找出可行投資方向。4.	運用幾位諾貝爾經濟學獎得主之文章，來介紹公司 (個人) 行為決策 5.	公司或個人如何利用期貨選擇權來進行公司 (個人) 理財投資行為之介紹
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence for the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged over the past two decades. Behavioural Economics starts from the premise that, in the real world, investors do not follow the rational assumptions which underlie the EMH. Behavioural Economics has developed to try to explain financial market anomalies which could effect the functioning of these markets.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理

description.zh: 本課程只在針對互聯網發展下如何釐清其中關鍵議題如什麼是互聯網、互聯網核心思維、互聯網與物聯網之區別、互聯網影響哪些行業、傳統性企業如何在物聯網時代轉型、及其未來之發展。之後其中之理論及各產業之應用案例之研討亦包含其中。
description.en: This course will focus on the development of the Internet for how to clarify the key issues such as what is the Internet, the Internet core thinking, the difference between the Internet+ and the Internet of Things, the impact of the Internet on which industry, how traditional enterprises in the era of things transition, and its future development. After which the theory and the application of the case study of the industry also includes them.

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以品牌理論來探討品牌行銷策略的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含品牌特性、品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、品牌策略。身為公司品牌經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The nature of brand, brand marketing, brand competition, brand strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.

notes: (群組 4) 行銷管理

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階主管的領導理論與實務。課程目的有三個：(1) 了解高階主管的領導與管理；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界高階主管提供具體建議。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of senior manager’s leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is (especially for the senior managers); (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for senior managers’ leadership.

name.en: The Leadership Philosophy of Senior Manager

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理 (關聯群 6)

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項・
description.en: This course has provided: money and capital market, Investments, How to obtaining and using funds, Maximize the value o their firms, How to maximize stockholders' stock, To know agency problem, To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy.

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人因觀點，探討智慧生活之產品與服務。授課主要以個案探討方式，使學生了解人因相關概念與方法，特別是使用者經驗與人本設計，以及如何將這些概念與方法導入組織中，並應用於相關產品與服務之開發與設計。
description.en: This course focuses on the products and services of smart living from the perspective of human factors. Courses will generally be taught through case studies. Students will learn the concepts and methods related to human factors, especially user experience and user centered design, and how these concepts and methods to be introduced into organizations and applied to the development and design of those products and services.

name.zh: 智慧生活與使用者經驗

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將討論凝固組織之控制因子，平衡及非平衡狀態下金屬凝固現象，凝固界面之溶質分佈，單晶成長技術，凝固之過冷界面穩定理論，共晶型組織之成長，凝固之熱流分析，凝固之成核成長及粗性及均質處，理凝固理論之應用及鑄造工程簡介。
description.en: The subject area covers the following topics: Control variable of solidification structure and its application; Single crystal growths from the melt and solid; Heat flow in single crystal growth; Solute distribution in solidification, various cases will be treated in detail; Constitutional undercooling and interface stability; Solidification of castings and ingots; Lamellar eutectic growth; Nucleation growth and coarsening; Foundry engineering; Defects analysis in cast construction.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料 (包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等) 基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1) 課程簡介，(2) 電化學基本原理與應用，(3) 水溶液系統電池分類與應用，(4) 非水溶液系統電池分類與應用，(5) 鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程，(6) 鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用，(7) 鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用，(8) 電解液材料與高分子電池特性，(9) 隔離膜材料功能與製作，(10) 薄膜電池，(11) 超高電容器材料原理與應用，(12) 儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 一、張量分析 (Tensor  analysis) 二、熱性質 (Thermal properties) 三、電性質 (Electrical  Properties) 四、介電性質 (Dielectric  Properties) 五、磁性質 (Magnetic  Properties) 六、 光學性質 (Optical  Properties)
description.en: This course is a special topics of Physical properties of Material.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹薄膜製作有關的基礎理論與技術。講述內容包括真空技術，薄膜基礎，薄膜製作技術，蝕刻技術，薄膜評估方法以及薄膜技術的應用等。讓學生認識薄膜在高科技產業上的應用與其重要性，製作薄膜的方法與技術以及其未來的發展。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Thin films technology and Thin film materials science. 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films.

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

notes: 新聘外籍師

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料 (包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等) 基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1) 課程簡介，(2) 電化學基本原理與應用，(3) 水溶液系統電池分類與應用，(4) 非水溶液系統電池分類與應用，(5) 鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程，(6) 鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用，(7) 鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用，(8) 電解液材料與高分子電池特性，(9) 隔離膜材料功能與製作，(10) 薄膜電池，(11) 超高電容器材料原理與應用，(12) 儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹現代矽奈米之元件物理與其操作原理，課程主題涵蓋金屬 / 半導體接面、能帶圖、金氧半電容元件、金氧半場效電晶體、金氧半場效電晶體之微縮、先進金氧半場效電晶體與其製程技術。
description.en: This course provides an introduction to the fundamental physics and operation principles of silicon-based nano devices in modern electronics. This class will cover topics include metal/semiconductor junctions, energy band diagrams, MOS capacitors, MOS field-effect transistors (MOSFETs). MOSFET scaling, modern MOSFETs, and future transistor technologies will also be discussed.

description.zh: 主要介紹結構陶瓷，生醫陶瓷，複合陶瓷等。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Structural Ceramics.

description.zh: 1. 基本觀念，2.RC 主動網路之元件與子網路，3. 具有零元件及任意元件的主動網路分析，4. 雙極接面電晶體之線性應用，5. 運算放大器之線性應用，6. 網路靈敏度，7. 分解，結構，及靈敏度，8. 二階濾波電路之合成與設計，9. 梯形濾波電路之合成與設計，10. 信號流程圖之濾波電路之合成與設計
description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts, 2.Elements and Sub-networks of RC-Active Networks, 3.Analysis of Active Networks using Nullors, 4.The Bipolar-Junction Transistor and Linear Applications, 5.The Operational Amplifier and Linear Circuit Applications, 6.Network Sensitivity, 7.Decomposition, Structures, and Sensitivity,8.Biquadratic Filter Synthesis and Design, 9.Ladder Filter Synthesis and Design, 10.Filter Design using Signal-Flow Graph Simulation

name.zh: RC 主動電路之分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and Design of RC-Active Circuits

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 電力系統簡介 3. MATLAB 簡介 4. 電力潮流分析 5. 最佳化調度 6. 電力系統故障之研究 7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

name.zh: 計算機在電力系統之應用

description.zh: 1. 概論 2. 鐵路變電所設計 3. 電力遙控系統 4. 電車線系統設計 5. 干擾與防護 6. 動力車的電力供應 7. 動力車的電力控制 8. 未來發展
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Railway substation design3. Power remote control system4. Catenary system design5. interference and protection6. Power supply of locomotive7. Power control of locomotive8. Future development

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介 2. 隨機程序 3. 數位調變與多工技術 4. 最佳接收器 5. 載波與符碼同步 6. 消息理論 7. 訊源編碼 8. 通道編碼 9. 展頻通訊系統 10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 本課程專為研究生所設計，提供機器人全方位之分析與應用，課程主題如下所示：1.         空間描述與座標轉換 2.         機械手臂運動學 3.         機械手臂反向運動學 4.         賈氏矩陣：速度與靜力 5.         機械手臂動力學 6.         軌跡規劃 7.         機械手臂控制 8.         機器視覺 9.         工業自動化應用 10.      實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制註：大四生須經授課教師同意方可選修。
description.en: This course is designed for graduate students and will provide a solid analytical and practical experience on a variety of aspects in robotics. Topics in the course are as follows.1.         Spatial descriptions and transformations 2.         Manipulation kinematics3.         Inverse manipulator kinematics4.         Jacobians: velocities and static forces5.         Manipulator dynamics6.         Trajectory generation7.         Control of manipulators8.         Machine vision9.         Industrial automation applications10.      Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robotsSenior undergraduate students are allowed to take this course in case they are approved by the instructor.

name.zh: 高等機器人與自動化應用

notes: 電機所、自動化所、電資、機械外生班和 AI 學程合開

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 電源轉換器 (Power Converter) 設計須滿足高效率及高功率密度的要求，因應此需求需搭配轉換器架構的選用、新型寬能隙元件的應用、高頻磁性元件的設計、柔性切換技術 (Soft Switching Techniques)。在本次課程將會介紹這些技術的原理及設計方法及高效能轉換器的技術核心：變壓器 (Transformer) 與磁性元件的設計要領及寬能隙元件應用的介紹。藉由理論探討與模擬實作，加強學生的理論知識與實作能力。
description.en: The design of power converters is being pushed to meet the requirements of high efficiency and high power density. In response to this demand, the selection of converter architecture, the application of new wide bandgap devices, the design of high-frequency magnetic components, and soft switching techniques are needed. This course introduces the principles and design methods of these technologies and the core technical aspects of high-efficiency converters, including the design of transformers and magnetic components, and the application of wide bandgap devices. This course is aimed at graduate students. Students can strengthen their theoretical knowledge and practical ability through theoretical discussion and simulation practice from this course.

name.zh: 進階電源轉換器設計實務
name.en: Advanced Power Converter Design and Practices

description.zh: 數位電源為目前各大電源轉換電路公司研究的議題。本課程將介紹數位電源轉換器的動作模式、控制與實作考量，配合模擬軟體驗證理論，最後以數位電源設計實例進行探討。本課程藉由理論探討與模擬實作，加強學生的理論知識與實作能力。
description.en: Digital power supply design is a major industrial topic. This course introduces the operation and control of digital power converters, and discusses the design principles and their implementation considerations. Simulation is used to validate the theory learned in this course. Also, digital power supply design examples are discussed in detail. Students can strengthen their theoretical knowledge and practical ability through theoretical discussion and simulation practice from this course.

name.zh: 數位電源控制與電路設計
name.en: Digital Power Supply Control and Circuit Design

description.zh: 本課程將探討錯誤診斷系統理論與相關控制系統工程知識，將以馬達與鋰電池為例，實際應用錯誤診斷理論，並學習錯誤診斷的實現與應用技巧。本課程藉由理論推導與程式模擬實作，協助學生專精控制工程領域知識，並透過期刊文章研讀與討論，進一步加強學生創新思考與簡報專業論文之能力。
description.en: This course investigates fault diagnosis system algorithms and their relevant control system engineering knowledges. This course takes motors and lithium-ion batteries as examples to implement the fault diagnosis algorithms and to learn the implementation skills of fault diagnosis algorithms. The goal of this course is to improve students’ control engineering domain knowledge though algorithm derivation, coding and simulations; also, to enhance students’ innovative thinking capabilities and presentation skills through journal paper reviewing and discussions.

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程探討無線通訊系統基頻演算法設計，主要包含多輸入多輸出傳輸系統中接收端與傳送端之聯合最佳化問題。課程綱要：1. 基本矩陣運算 2. 多輸入多輸出接收機設計 3. 多輸入多輸出天線選擇 4. 多輸入多輸出前置編碼器設計
description.en: This course aims at the baseband algorithm design for wireless communication systems. Much attention will be focused on the joint multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) transceiver optimization.Course outline:1.Basic matrix operations.2.MIMO receiver design.3.MIMO antenna selection.4.MIMO precoder design.

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: 限博士班修習，製科所和機電博專題討論合開，英文授課

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

notes: 博士班 科研國際會議廳

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 博班必修，碩士不計學分，須面談加簽

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論，技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 限碩二

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 限博士班

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

notes: 碩二修讀

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧，正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

notes: 英文授課

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 博班修讀

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

notes: 博士班必修

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 專題討論 - 化學工程組

notes: 限博士班化工組選課，和化工碩合開

name.zh: 專題討論 - 生化與生醫工程組

notes: 限博士班生化組選課，和生化碩合開

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills.  Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

notes: 日、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: 日、職車輛所、能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: 英文授課，日、職車輛所、能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills.  Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

notes: 日、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程之目的係協助學生進行設計意象相關主題之研究與實務專題分析，以培養各種意象理論與分析方法之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the students whose topics of graduate projects are related to design image to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case analysis, and its contents contain image of material, image of shape, image of content, to establish the ability about theory of image and analysis method.

notes: 創新碩與設計博合開

description.zh: Brundtland 報告在 1987 年將永續發展定義為「在不損害後代子孫滿足其自身需求的能力的前提下滿足當前需求的發展。」17 個永續發展目標依循千禧年共同訂定發展目標的成功基礎上延展，其中包括諸如氣候變化，經濟不平等，創新，可持續消費，和平與正義等新領域。17 個永續發展目標更於 2016 年 1 月成為聯合國致力發展推動政策及生效直至 2030 年。本課程旨在探討研究「永續發展」新概念和理論基礎。課程論述著重於工業化國家（尤其是台灣地區）的永續性問題，例如人口老齡化，可持續消費等。課程中透過創新產品設計與開發方法來系統化引導學生探索有關可持續性，經濟和技術層面以及相關知識社會學，並嘗試帶領學生提出具可行性的新產品、系統及服務概念，為當前狀態下提供更好的友善環境解決方案。課程期待學生透過修習該課程，應可以掌握跨學科永續發展的設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計和開發方法來引導不同永續相關背景和設計背景的專業人員合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之環境友善產品之關鍵課題，針對環境需求，提出創新友善環境解決方案並進而產生創新環境友善產品。
description.en: Sustainable development is defined by Brundtland Report (1987) as “development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.” There are 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) build on the successes of the Millennium Development Goals, while including new areas such as climate change, economic inequality, innovation, sustainable consumption, peace and justice, among other priorities. The 17 SDGs came into effect in January 2016, and they will continue to guide UNDP policy and funding until 2030. This course aims to explore alternative conceptions and theoretical underpinnings of the notion of “sustainable development.” It focuses on the sustainability problems of industrial countries, especially in Taiwan such as aging of populations, sustainable consumption, etc. It intends to use IPDD approach systematically to explore the sociology of knowledge around sustainability, the economic and technological dimensions a

notes: 創新日職碩、設計博合開

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。
description.en: This course aims to enhance oral and written communication skills and in the process provide a greater understanding of the philosophy underlying academic discourse. Weekly units are oriented around a progressive series of tasks which consider academic texts in context and require learners to understand, analyse and produce spoken and written texts appropriate to the context of academic English. The contextualisation of these tasks is the philosophical aspects of critical analysis. Themes, such as the difference between convention, fact, opinion and preference; deductive and inductive proof; validity and truth; evidence; and the ethics of persuasion, are the basis on which the skills are taught.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題 (二)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(II)

notes: 日職合開；上限 8 人
