description.zh: 安全程式設計是資訊安全領域中的關鍵技術。不良的「程式設計習慣」和「不考慮安全保護的程式設計」很容易導致可有心人士所利用。本課程除了建立安全程式設計的基礎知識外，特別著重於同學的實務能力、漏洞測試、與安全程式開發能力。同時，透過分享最新的論文研究與相關技術報告，協助研究生在研究階段獲取最新的領域知識。
description.en: Security programming is a key technology in the field of information security. “Bad programming habits” and “programming without security consideration” can easily lead to the use of malicious people. Four major themes will be explored.In addition to establishing the basic knowledge of security programming, this course focuses on student's practical ability, vulnerability testing, and security programming development ability. At the same time, by sharing novel research papers and related technical reports, the students can obtain the newest and complete domain knowledge in their research stage.

notes: 資工所和資安學程合開

description.zh: 區塊鏈技術 (作為比特幣等數位貨幣的核心) 已重塑了金融交易與分散式交互方式之未來。同時它也被期待帶給我們一個更自組與可提供事實證明的數位化世界。抽象化區塊鏈構造是非常精巧的，它倚賴輕量化密碼學工具搭配分散式系統概念，完成了開放、安全且有效率的系統 (如比特幣)。本課程為區塊鏈技術與應用上之概念介紹，包含：比特幣與區塊鏈設計、相關基礎密碼學工具、分散式網路與共識、區塊鏈應用。
description.en: Blockchain techniques (the core of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin) have reshaped the future of financial transactions and decentralized interactions. They are also expected to bring us a more self-organizing and dependent digital world. The abstraction of blockchain is very delicate. It relies on cryptography tools and decentralized system concepts to achieve an open, secure, and efficient system (such as Bitcoin). This course aims to introduce the concepts of blockchain techniques and applications, including Bitcoin and blockchain design, basic cryptography tools, decentralized networks and consensus, and blockchain applications.

notes: 資工四、資工所和資安學程合開

description.zh: 本課程針對幼稚園、國小、與國中階段的英語師資而設計，在教材與教法的搭配上提供學理的引介與實務上的訓練。本課程設計考量這些階段學生之身心發展程度與興趣，將屬於兒童與青少年文學範疇的文本（例如：希臘神話、哈利波特系列、波西傑克森系列等等）作創意運用，幫助老師們擷取並改編合宜的教材，經由活潑的教學活動（包括：改編戲劇演出、繪本製作、歌唱舞蹈等等），提高學生的英語能力，也在培養他們體察文化差異的深層素養。
description.en: Designed for kindergarten, elementary school, and junior high school English teacher, this course aims to provide practical training and theories in teaching materials and pedagogy. Students of this course will also learn to adapt children and teenager literary works such as Greek mythology, the Harry Potter series, and the Posey Jackson series into materials suitable for students at the above-specified age groups. Possible learning activities such as role-play, picture books, dancing/singing will also be explored as methods to both develop students' English proficiency and cultural awareness.

name.zh: 兒童文學融入英語教學
name.en: Children's Literature and English Language Teaching

description.zh: 傳統發音教學大多根據教師直覺認為語音是該如何產製的、或發音課本中教條式的規則。在這堂課，學生將透過具體的聲學和構音資料、來學習重要語音學原則，並學習將原則正確地應用在發音教學當中。學生也將探討如何將這些知識轉化成不同年齡層和語言程度之學生可以接受的內容。
description.en: Traditionally, pronunciation teaching has been based on "armchair data" (e.g., the instructor's intuition on how a sound should be articulated) or prescriptive statements in pronunciation textbooks. In this course, students will learn fundamental principles of phonetics through experimental acoustic and articulatory data and learn how to apply them to pronunciation teaching. Students will be challenged to translate what they have learned to digestible pronunciation instructions for students of different ages and proficiency levels.

name.zh: 語音學和英語發音教學

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 西方文化的交流是建立在故事上的。即使這些故事相當久遠，但每個人卻都非常熟悉，又或者是因為這些故事相當久遠，所以每個人都非常熟悉。本課程將探討近代主要西方作家 — 喬瑟及莎士比亞 — 作品中的核心主題及文化的意象。研讀這些近代西方主要作家的作品是發展西方文學素養及思想的基石，同時，也為任何概括了以西方文化為主體的研究提供了不可或缺的背景知識。
description.en: Conversation in Western culture is built on stories. Everybody knows the stories even though the stories are very old, or rather everybody knows them because they are very old stories. This course introduces students to some of the stories that have been most influential in the English-speaking world. Knowing these stories provides essential background knowledge for understanding Western culture in general.

description.zh: 本課程旨在研討專業英文研究及應用，課程包括專業領域英語文之語域分析，探討各領域中的語法及詞彙特點，並進一步分析不同領域中之修辭及言語萹章使用，進而研討語言溝通目標功能分析並結合策略研究，以將理論應用於專業實務及研究中。
description.en: This course is intended for graduate students who are pre-experienced in working in specific fields of professions. For other students who are inexperienced in the workplace are required to have consolidated knowledge and observations of the world industries. It aims to address the applicability of theories in EPP and the plethora of situations raised from such applications. The course will provide theoretical studies for applications in respect to register analysis, rhetorical and discourse analysis, functionality analysis and skills and strategies. It is also expected that the course will describe other models in EPP studies.

name.en: Theories and Practice in English for Professional Purposes

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹質性研究中傳統的研究法，藉由深入探討採用不同質性研究方法的研究報告、以及實地進行質性研究以幫助學生掌握各項質性研究方法的運用與分析方法的技巧。
description.en: This course aims at introducing fundamental qualitative research methods to help students acquire skills and experiences in adopting a wide range of methodological and analytical techniques through studying qualitative research reports and conducting the qualitative study.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

notes: 博二選課，請依分組 & 共同討論上課時間

description.zh: 一。電力設備的故障二。比壓器，比流器三。保護電驛的構造及動作原理四。常用的保護電驛五。發電機與電動機的保護六。變壓器的保護七。線路保護八。異常電壓的預防九。熔絲十。保護協調
description.en: <一>INTRODUCTION<二>WHAT REALLY IS THE MVA METHOD<三>THE ABC OF THE MVA<四>WHY THE MVA METHOD<五>COMPARISON OF THREE METHODS<六>CAN PHASE-GROUND FAULT BE SOLVED <七>MVA METHODS FOR INSTANTANEOUS VOLTAGE ESTIMATE<八>THE SIMPLE COMPUTER TIME SHARE PROGRAM<九>CONCLUSION

description.zh: 車輛的應用中包含許多的化學反應，例如噴漆和塗料的使用，要了解車用塗料的操作原理、和研發特用的功能，需要具備基礎化學、有機化學、高分子化學和塗料的知識。本課程針對漆的化學概念，介紹車輛中所使用化學品相關的化學理論，進一步連結到學生在現場時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的化學反應現象。
description.en: The applications of vehicles include many chemical reactions, such as the use of paint spraying and coatings. To understand the operation principle and to develop special chemical function, it is necessary to have knowledge of general chemistry, organic chemistry, polymer chemistry and coatings. This course aims at teaching key chemical concepts, introduces chemical theories related to chemicals used in vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the chemical reaction phenomena observed.

notes: 車輛四、日、職車輛所、技優專班三合開

description.zh: 車輛的應用中包含許多的化學反應，例如噴漆和塗料的使用，要了解車用塗料的操作原理、和研發特用的功能，需要具備基礎化學、有機化學、高分子化學和塗料的知識。本課程針對漆的化學概念，介紹車輛中所使用化學品相關的化學理論，進一步連結到學生在現場時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的化學反應現象。
description.en: The applications of vehicles include many chemical reactions, such as the use of paint spraying and coatings. To understand the operation principle and to develop special chemical function, it is necessary to have knowledge of general chemistry, organic chemistry, polymer chemistry and coatings. This course aims at teaching key chemical concepts, introduces chemical theories related to chemicals used in vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the chemical reaction phenomena observed.

notes: 車輛四、日、職車輛所、技優專班三合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意瞭解原子結構乃是起碼的科技素養，本課程主要的目的是建立學生將來可以以 X 光作為研究工具的能力。本課程主要可分成四部份：一是結晶學原理、二是 X 光繞射的原理、三是 X 光繞射的基本應用、四是材料的結構分析。除此之外，並將進行一小部份實驗以驗證學理，同學可從實驗中學習檢驗製程中材料所發生問題，從而解決製造的問題。
description.en: Topics covered include properties of X-rays, geometry of crystals, directions of diffracted Beams, intensity of diffracted beams, orientation and quality of single crystals, structure of polycrystalline aggregates, determinations of crystal structure, phase diagram determination, and Experiments.

notes: 限 25 人

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一，限 50 人

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2. 雷射基本原理  3. 各種雷射介紹  4. 雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

notes: 限 50 人，一般教室

description.zh: 微加工程序含 MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含 MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

notes: 限 40 人

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數 I/O 控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

notes: 限 21 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 22 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念 2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式 3. 形狀函數及等參數元素 4. 一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等 5. 二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題：一般實體 7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理 8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用 9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 製科所、機電博和外生班合開

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

notes: 限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 超音波技術簡介 2. 基礎彈性力學 3. 彈性動力學 4. 平面波 5. 平面波的反射 6. 平面波的折射 7. 表面波 8. 藍姆波 (平板波) 9. 超音波於非破壞檢測之應用 10. 超音波於材料性質量測之應用 11. 超音波於醫學診斷與治療之應用 12. 超音波於感測器及通訊應用之應用 13. 超音波於加工應用之應用
description.en: 1.Introduction to ultrasonics 2.Basic elasticity for ultrasonics 3.Elastodynamics 4.Plane waves 5.Reflection of plane waves 6.Refraction of plane waves 7.Surface waves 8.Lamb waves 9.Ultrasonics in nondestructive testing  10.Application of ultrasonics to material characterizations 11.Application of ultrasonics in medical diagnostics and treatments 12.Application of ultrasonics to sensors and telecommunications 13.Application of ultrasonics to machining

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 機電所和製科所合開，限 25 人

description.zh: 本課程探討人工智慧 (AI) 與工程應用相關議題，並討論其解決方案與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深，包含基礎 python 程式設計、資料預處理、資料探索、機器學習、深度學習、AI 工程應用介紹 (分子性質預測、設備預測性維護、混凝土強度預測，PM2.5 預測、房價預測等案例應用分析) 及專題製作。在本課程中，學生可了解 AI 之基本原理及 AI 在工程上的應用，本課程也藉由 AI 程式撰寫的實作實習，提昇工程背景學生撰寫與理解 AI 應用程式設計的技能，以幫助學生將人工智慧導入產業應用實務中。
description.en: This course will introduce artificial intelligence (AI) and its applications in engineering fields. Topics covered include basic python programming, data prepossessing, data exploration, machine learning, deep learning, AI applications in engineering fields (e.g. predicting molecular properties, predictive maintenance predicting compressive strength of concrete, prediction of PM2.5, and prediction of house price, etc.) and final project. Students can learn about the basic principles and engineering applications of AI. Coding will be required to improve their programming competence in AI. The course intends to help the students implement AI concepts in their industrial practices.

name.zh: 人工智慧與工程應用實作
name.en: Artificial Intelligence for Engineering Applications in Practice

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用 3D 繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

notes: 綜科 802, 限 24 人

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 限 30 人

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 電腦模擬是解決現今工程問題不可或缺之工具，但常用的商業模擬軟體不但價格昂貴，其功能常不足以應付前瞻研究所需。本課程旨在培養學生設計專業領域之模擬程式與分析工具的能力，強化軟體開發工程實務的素養。課程訓練分兩階段進行：第一階段確認學生具備基本程式設計能力。首先使其熟悉 Linux 平台及開源軟體的使用，運行不須理論基礎的簡易粒子模擬，針對收集到的數據進行統計分析，資料視覺化，資料定量分析及洞察等任務。以任務導向的學習方式，刺激同學針對特定問題和需求而快速擬定演算法，系統性地解決問題。第二階段將模擬工具開發的能力應用在各科系的專業上。在進行短暫的文獻回顧後，與修課學生討論其專業領域中可用模擬解決或加速的學術研究及產業問題。針對主題制定計畫內容後，以選定的程式語言撰寫相關的應用程式，並以開發成開源軟體為最終目標。註一、課程函授上以 GNU Fortran 和 Python3 為主要程式語言選擇，但學生可自由選擇所熟悉的語言作為工具。註二、修課基本條件為修畢工程學院各系一年級程式設計相關之基礎課程，且具基本撰寫程式的能力。
description.en: This course aims to provide complete training for developing modeling and simulation tools in engineering applications. Students will obtain the ability to analyze problems, formulate algorithms, write code, and implement the developed open-source programs in their fields of study. The first part of the training focuses on task-oriented coding experiences. Students will get familiar with the Linux platform and open-source programs. They will perform simple, particle-based simulations. The collected data will be analyzed, visualized, and interpreted based on the programs written by students.The second part of the training applies the coding knowledge to students’ fields of study. After the literature survey, students will select the topic based on theirexpertise, where research or industrial problems can be accelerated by computer modeling. The final goal is to create software based on the course project.

name.en: Development of Simulation Tools  for Engineering

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於建立學生有關於軟性半導體與元件應用之相關技術與知識，並在學期中讓學生實際動手製備與量測有機半導體元件，以對於有機半導體應用有更深入的認識。課程主題主要 (1) 有機半導體物理介紹；(2) 有機半導體元件製程與封裝技術；(3) 有機發光二極體 (OLED) 元件應用；(4) 有機場效應電晶體應用；(5) 有機太陽能電池；(6) 有機記憶體元件應用；(7) 有機感測器應用；(8) 奈米碳材元件。
description.en: The goal of this class is to build basic knowledge about organic semiconductors and device applications. Students will also learn how to fabricate organic electronics and have further understanding. The main topics of this class include (1) physics of organic semiconductors; (2) device fabrications and processes; (3) organic light-emitting diodes; (4) organic field-effect transistors; (5) organic solar cells; (6) organic memory; (7) organic sensors; (8) carbon nanomaterial devices.

name.zh: 軟性電子材料與元件應用
name.en: Soft Electronic Materials and Device applications

notes: 網路預選限 25 人 (研究所)；大三四化工所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理 (關聯群 3)

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

notes: (群組 4) 行銷管理

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

notes: (群組 5) 創新與創業管理

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理

description.zh: 透過自駕車理論與實務的課程講述，以及搭配業師實作經驗分享，除可以使修課同學對自駕車研究有基本概念之外，也可以藉本堂課引發對新興車輛技術研究領域與其實際應用之興趣。本課程涵蓋內容為自駕車軌跡規劃與控制、先進駕駛輔助控制設計、自駕車感知資料處理及物件偵測演算法、及 AI 技術應用於自駕車相關功能設計。本課程根據授課主題搭配實驗單元與期末專題，配合使用 Matlab/Simulink、CarSim、Python、AI ToolBox 等工具軟體，讓修課同學可應用課堂所學來進行自駕車演算法與技術開發，及透過模擬結果分析與驗證。
description.en: This course aims to teach the lessons of autonomous vehicle (AV) theory and practical applications. Moreover, with the experience sharing and cooperative lecturing from industrial experts, students can gain more knowledge about the fundamental concepts of AV research. The course introduces major contents including path planning and tracking control design, advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS), perception data processing and detection algorithms, and AI-based technologies in the applications of AV. The course will arrange some labs and the term project to provide students, through conducted simulation analysis and verification, with an in-depth understanding of the emerging technology of AV.

description.zh: 本課程開授之目標，在讓修習之學生能將鐵道車輛之工程技術與跨領域設計相互融合，在工程分析面能配合跨領域人文設計之需求，並在人文設計面瞭解工程之規範與要求。本課程內容包括鐵道車輛之系統基本架構、鐵道車輛結構及動態之基本工程分析技術、鐵道車輛車廂之功能性設計、及鐵道人文文化；本課程並配合軌道單位之校外參訪，讓課堂所學能與實務技術融合。本課程是以跨院合授的方式，由鐵道車輛技術研發中心、車輛系、文化事業發展系之師資共同參與授課。
description.en: This course aims to provide students the knowledge of engineering technology and interdisciplinary design for railway vehicles.  Design of railway vehicles should consider both the engineering and interdisciplinary cultural design at the same time.  A designer should consider not only engineering regulations and requirements, but also concepts of cultural design.  This course covers basic introduction of railway vehicle system, basic analysis of vehicle structures and dynamics, vehicle interior and exterior functional design, and railway culture.  The industrial tour in this course helps students to realize the theoretical and practical parts of railway vehicles.  This course is a joint lecture instructed by professional faculties from Railway Vehicle Research Center, Department of Vehicle Engineering, and Department of Cultural Vocation Development.

name.zh: 鐵道車輛技術與跨領域設計
name.en: Engineering Technology and Interdisciplinary Design for Railway Vehicle

notes: 車輛三、四、車輛所合開

description.zh: 室內空氣品質及室內空氣污染對人體之危害、空氣環境汙染物、換氣與通風、檢測方法、污染源診斷、空氣品質控制及改善、國內外法規、管理計劃規劃。含室內空氣污染物之移除技術、室內空氣清淨機原理應用於室內空氣品質之控制。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, air pollutants, fresh air and air conditioning & ventilation, indoor air quality control, management and regulation, indoor air cleaners.

name.zh: 室內空氣品質控制與管理
name.en: Indoor Air Quality Control and management

description.zh: 這門課除了教授傳統企業環境管理及相關實務之外，特別將著重在企業提升如何透過綠色創新來提升綠色競爭力的策略與做法；此外，課程另一重點將會是企業如何透過協助聯合國永續發展目標 (UN SDGs) 的達成，來創造企業的永續競爭力。學生將會深入探究金字塔底層 (BOP) 與創造共享價值 (Creating Shared Value, CSV) 之理論及實務做法，以及成為一個真正永續企業的策略。
description.en: In this course, traditional corporate environmental management and the strategies for improving green competitiveness will be taught. In addition, the strategies of corporate sustainability- how the corporate to create sustainable competitiveness by coping with the 17 goals of UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs) will also be taught. Theories and practices of Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) and Creating Shared Value (CSV), as well as the strategies of being a true sustainable enterprise will be emphasized in the class.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對薄膜處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。薄膜的種類介紹包括薄膜逆滲透、奈米薄膜、超過濾、微過濾、前驅滲透、電透析以及薄膜生物處理。基本理論包括薄膜前處理、質量傳輸、積垢、結構、薄膜阻塞及清理、後處理及實務應用。
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of membrane process for water treatment, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ultrafiltration, microfiltration, forward osmosis, electrodialysis and membrane bioreactor. The theories include pretreatment, mass transfer, fouling, scaling, membrane cleaning, post treatment and practical application.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解 4R 之原理，除了相關的法令之外，亦包括：1. 減廢方法與技術 2. 資源化方法與技術 3. 廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4. 廢棄物生命週期之分析 5. 減廢策略與管理體系等
description.en: This course is to introduce the principles of 4R in the waste management. In addition to related regulations, contents of this course include pollution prevention approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源 (如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源 (如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等) 及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 限碩二選課

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 製科所和機電博班合開，限博士班修習

description.zh: 本課程以深入淺出之方式，介紹與機器學習之相關技術及演算法，目標是修習本課程之學生具有閱讀機器學習相關文獻之基本知識，並能從事相關之實務或電腦模擬實驗之工作，因此本課程著重在廣泛介紹各類之演算法之應用，而非深究少數演算法之深奧數學原理．本課程涵蓋之演算法，包含：最佳化基本知識，隨機最佳化演算法，隨機搜尋，決策樹，隨機森林，類神經網路及深度學習相關演算法，基因演算法，貝氏定理及應用，高斯混合模型，隱藏式馬可夫鍊 (及訓練演算法)，支援向量機，線性及邏輯回歸，分群方法，降維方法，提升方法，決策融合技巧，及增強式學習等。
description.en: This course covers most of the techniques and algorithms related to the current trend in the machine learning field. The goal of the course is that students complete this course can read and understand the literature in the machine learning field, and can conduct computer simulations for experiments or apply the techniques to practical problems. Therefore, the course intends to cover a broad range of algorithms with emphasis on applications, rather than to cover only a few algorithms with extensive mathematical treatments. The algorithms covered in this course include: foundations of optimizations, random search, decision tree, random decision forests, neural networks and deep learning, genetic algorithm, Bayes' theorem and its applications, Gauss mixture model, hidden Markov model, support vector machine, linear and logistic regressions, clustering algorithms, dimension reduction techniques, boosting methods, decision level fusion techniques, and reinforcement learning.

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 資料科學是個跨領域的重要興新學科，其基本知識含括資訊、線性代數、機率與統計等，相關技術可應用在許多領域上，包含教育領域。本課程從學科整體介紹開始，討論資料科學中各主要階段的相關議題：包含資料搜尋擷取、資料整理與問題發想、數理知識回顧與討論、資料分析建模與方法、資料呈現與視覺化等。除課堂上講授與討論外，課程亦著重如何實際應用所學，將使用教育資料並以小組方式進行議題發想與分析實作的學期專題。此外，為強化健全資料視覺呈現課題，在實作專題中課程亦著重學生報告能力的培養，希望培育出全方位的資料科學人才。
description.en: Data science is an emerging interdisciplinary field that explores how to produce the valuable knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to many applications, including education. The topics include data processing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and data analysis. The course introduces the rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with fundamental related knowledge and the ability to use software tools. The major phases on data manipulation-collection, preparation, analytics, and presentation, in data science will be discussed. The course training is toward equipping students with the mindset and the ability to solve problems with the learned techniques on educational data. In addition, students need to practice the presentation for the findings of the studied problem in order to equip with the ability to convey the thoughts well and demonstrate things visually.

name.zh: 資料科學原理與教育數據應用
name.en: Data Science Principles with Applications on Educational Data

notes: 電資外、資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在教授學生瞭解雲端環境及物聯網系統架構並進一步教授雲端環境及物聯網安全需求，課程內容除介紹雲端環境及物聯網系統的基本概念外，亦將由 OWASP 的雲端安全及物聯網安全重點進行說明，培養學生有能力分析雲端及物聯網環境中的各式潛在安全威脅，並具備設計與實作具安全防護能力的雲端及物聯網系統。課程內容包含：●雲服務技術簡介●雲服務安全●雲服務資安標準●物聯網技術簡介●工業物聯網潛在威脅●工控資安●物聯網資安檢測●物聯網資安標準●資安安全與隱私保護
description.en: This course aims to guide students understanding cloud environments and IoT systems and their corresponding security requirements. In addition to introducing basic concepts of cloud environment and IoT system, the course contents will focus on OWASP's cloud security and IoT security. All practical techniques will be explained. Students are able to analyze various potential security threats in the cloud and Internet of Things environments, and to learn security protection capabilities for cloud and IoT systems. Course contents including:�P●	Introduction to cloud technologies�P●	Introduction to cloud security�P●	Security standards for cloud services �P●	Introduction to IoT technologies�P●	Potential threats of industrial IoT systems�P●	Industrial Cyber Security introduction�P●	IoT security detection�P●	IoT security standards�P●	Information security and privacy protection

notes: 資工所、電資外生所和資安學程合開

description.zh: 本課程將深入介紹檔案系統與儲存系統之作用原理，課程主軸將涵蓋 1. 輸出 / 輸入設備 2. 磁碟陣列與資料可靠性 3. 檔案系統基礎與設計原理 4. 分散式檔案系統 5. 新興儲存裝置 與 6. 鍵值儲存系統。修習本課程之學生將須要具備下列基礎知識，包含作業系統、C 語言以及基礎 Linux 指令。同時，本課程也將依照課程進展介紹最新的新興儲存裝置、檔案系統與儲存系統之相關研究以及大數據管理等議題。
description.en: This course will detail the working principles and design philosophy of file and storage systems and with prime focus on (1) I/O Devices, (2) RAID and Data Integrity, (3) File system Basics and Designs, (4) Distributed File System, (5) Emerging Storage Devices, (6) Key Value Stores. Please be noted that the knowledge of Operating System, C language, and the use of basic Linux command are required before taking this course. Depending on the current research trends, the course also discusses the latest applied storage topics, especially related to scalable and dependable big data management.

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要探索分析不實訊息的方法，透過這門課將學習到異常訊息、社交工程、傳播路徑及深度造假等對不實訊息分析的技術，包含語意分析、帳號識別分析及傳播路徑對不實訊息的影響分析。
description.en: This course is mainly to explore the methods of analyzing false information. Through this course, you will learn the techniques of analyzing false information, such as abnormal information, social engineering, propagation path and deep fake, including semantic analysis, account identification analysis and propagation path. Analysis of the impact of false information.

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 自主移動式機器人課程提供近年來在移動機器人的研究概況，以及相關的技術開發。本課程將將說明近三十年來領域發展歷史，讓同學了解包括機器人運動學、感測技術、定位與導航技術，以及實際應用的各項近期的進展。
description.en: Autonomous Mobile Robots presents an overview of technologies and methods for mobile robotics research. The specific goals of this course follow: 1. To provide historical context about mobile robotics, primarily over the past 30 years. 2. To enable students to study a chosen, specific mobile robotic technology. 3. To study state-of-the-art mobile robot research in detail.

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 實現計算已從傳統地本地端機器獨立完成，進而委託上雲端等服務提供者協力完成。然而隨著資料或應用的授權，相關的計算安全性必須重新被探討。本課程將會從資料的隱密性出發，探討如何使用同態加密法輕鬆完成一個安全的授權計算，進而利用其他輕量化元件 (混淆電路、私密分享) 來取代同態加密並重新設計授權計算協定。接著會轉往定義資料的隱私性，並介紹 k 匿名等去識別化技術，最終帶入現今最嚴謹的差分隱私。透過上述之保有隱私與安全方法，將著名的人工智慧與機器學習演算法導入授權計算之中，重構不同情境的新型態安全計算框架。
description.en: The implementation of computation has been completed independently from the local machine, and then outsourced to the cloud (or some service providers) to complete it. However, with the delegation of data or applications, accordingly the security of such computation must be revisited. This course will start from the data confidentiality, discuss how to use homomorphic encryption to easily complete a secure outsourced computation, and then use other lightweight components (garbled circuit, secret sharing) to replace homomorphic encryption and redesign the secure protocols. Then it will move to define the privacy of data, introduce de-identification techniques such as k-anonymity, and finally bring the most rigorous notion of differential privacy. Through the above-mentioned methods of preserving privacy and security, artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms are introduced into the outsourced computation to reconstruct a new type of the framework for different scenarios.

notes: 二教 103PBL 教室。資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 醫用電子學之基礎。2. 生醫電物理化學之基礎。3. 人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4. 生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5. 醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6. 量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7. 生醫電訊號處理技術。8. 超音波、紅外線、X 光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9. 醫用電子安全規格製訂。10. 醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7 醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12. 中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

notes: 機電所和機械外生班合開，限 50 人

description.zh: 21 世紀國際為確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展，國際紛紛採取氣候變遷相關因應措施，低碳與淨零已成為全球之共同趨勢。本課程將介紹能源轉型 / 節能減碳與低碳經濟及社會之國際趨勢、國際溫室氣體減量與能源安全相關法規、我國溫室氣體減量與節能相關法規等，並介紹碳足跡、碳中和等概念，由國際相關案例看我國邁向低碳經濟與社會挑戰與機會。
description.en: To ensure the sustainable development of environment, economy and society, effective measures are gradually adopted by internationals. Low-Carbonization and Net-Zero Emission obviously becomes a global common tendency. This course will be introduced the international tendencies of “energy saving & carbon reduction” and “low-carbon society”. It will also be introduced with related regulations of international greenhouse gases reduction, energy security, Taiwan GHG reduction, energy saving. The above concepts and latter concepts of carbon footprints and carbon neutral will be introduced with international practical cases to refer to challenges as well as chances toward a low-carbon Economy and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2. 探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3. 進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4. 學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

notes: 日建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1. 概論 2. 文化遺產防災之重要性 3. 文化遺產防災之基本策略 4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式 5. 文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在強化有關都市土地使用規劃與成長管理的理論與經驗，以及增進對都市整體建成環境未來的瞭解。因此，本課程將藉由對都市土地使用規劃與成長管理經驗特有與一般課題、對策及創新作法的基礎瞭解，以培養理論與實務的知能。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、都市成長對土地的需求。 二、土地使用管制與倫理。三、都市變遷與規劃。四、都市成長管理與政府的角色。 五、達到都市成長管理的可能途徑。 六、都市成長管理體系內的必要措施：例如環境、交通運輸、住宅、財政、風險、信託、組織等。 七、結論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with urban land use planning and growth management, and the struggle to define the collective future of our built environment. By identifying unique as well as common issues, problems, and innovations in urban growth management experiences, our hope is to improve planning practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Land needs for urban growth. 2. Land use control and ethics. 3. Urban change and planning. 4.Growth management and the role of government. 5. Alternative approaches to growth management. 6. Balancing planning needs in growth management systems: environmental, transportation, housing, financing, risk, trust and organization concerns. 7. Conclusions

name.zh: 都市土地使用計畫與成長管理
name.en: Urban Land Use Planning and Growth Management

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

notes: 日職建都所合開

description.zh: 建立節能車輛模擬平台，用以評估主系統與次系統之性能與響應關係，並以行車型態為例，分析能量管理系統、引擎、馬達、燃料電池、變速箱與不同儲能電池彼此之特性影響，進一步完成整車調校與控制策略之修正；介紹節能車輛中所使用數學模型與相關理論，進一步連結到學生在實務時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的物理反應現象。
description.en: Establish the energy-saving vehicle simulation platforms are developed in this study to evaluate performance and response between main system and subsystems. The driving cycles are adopted as an example and characteristics among energy management system (EMS), engine, motor, fuel cell, automated manual transmission (AMT) and Energy storage batteries are analyzed for further calibration and modification of control strategy. This course aims at teaching key mathematical models and related theories used in energy-saving vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the physical reaction phenomena observed.

name.zh: 節能車輛模擬與嵌入式系統
name.en: Energy-saving vehicle simulation and embedded system

notes: 英文授課，日、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 「仿生工程」是生物學到工程技術的觀念轉移，生物系統在上億年的演化驗證後已經達到高效且永續的精緻成果，本課程將介紹仿生工程之最新發展，師法自然將其應用於工程上將帶來革命性的突破。課程內容包含四大主題: (1) 仿生概述、(2) 生物製造技術、(3) 生物高分子與 (4) 生物材料於仿生技術上的應用。
description.en: “Biomimetic Engineering” is a kind of knowledge transferring from biology to engineering technology. After billions of years of evolution, it has been proven that the biological system is highly efficient and sustainable. In this course, the latest progress in Biomimetic Engineering will be introduced. It will bring us revolutionary breakthroughs if we learn from nature and apply it to technology. The topics covered in this course will include (1) an introduction to bioinspiration, (2) biofabrication, (3) biomacromolecules, and (4) biomaterials and their application in bioinspired engineering.

notes: 化工所生化所合開

description.zh: 課程內容包括：原理探討：超音波，磁場與磁性，電磁感應與渦電流，輻射線，液體表面現象，材料微結構；方法介紹：磁場檢測法，超音波檢測法，渦電流檢測法，X 光檢測法，液滲法，微奈米檢測 (各種顯微鏡) 等；材料非破壞檢測實驗：導電性材料、磁性材料、陶瓷材料、複合材料之缺陷檢測；結構非破壞檢測實驗：機械零件、以及特定結構之檢測；非破壞檢測影像：電腦數據擷取、數據分析、與影像處理
description.en: Introduce the concepts of following topics, Fundamentals: ultrasonic waves, magnetic field and magnetism, electromagnetic induction and eddy currents, X-rays, penetrants. NDT methods: ultrasonic testing, magnetoscopic inspections, eddy current testing, radiographic technique, penetrants method. NDT of materials: conductive materials, magnetic materials, ceramics, composite materials. NDT of structures: mechanical components, specific structures. NDT images: PC-based data acquisition, data analysis and image process.

name.zh: 材料與結構非破壞檢測
name.en: Non-Destructive Testing of Materials and Structures

notes: 機電所、日職製科所和機電博、博外生班合開，合計限 14

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1) 脊椎生物力學、(2) 關節生物力學、(3) 骨折生物力學、(4) 復健生物力學、(5) 運動生物力學、(6) 心血管生物力學、(7) 植入物設計原理、(8) 手術器械設計原理、(9) 矯具設計原理與 (10) 病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 21 人

description.zh: 先修課程：統計學基礎統計介紹、一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、隨機化區集法、拉丁方格法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor, two-factor, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized block design, Latin square, and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 25 人

description.zh: 本課程沿續「積體電路製程先進技術與設備」課程，介紹半導體世代機台開發與製程應用、關鍵元件設計概念與應用，著重科學基礎知識如何應用在半導體產業。
description.en: As an extension of “Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing” course, this course focuses on how the scientific knowledge is connected and applied to the real development of tools and introduces the evolution of the design and application of semiconductor tools and key components.

name.zh: 半導體尖端設備與關鍵元件
name.en: Semiconductor advanced equipment and key components

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，請教務處安排教室，限 40 人

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 機電所、製科所和自動化所合開，限 20 人

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

notes: 機電所、製科所和機械、車輛外生班合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的在於教授都市設計的基本分析理論與方法，除透過課堂案例的介紹與討論外，學生還將以分組方式進行觀察研究與運算分析。案例介紹與討論之重點在於認識影響都市空間環境品質的關鍵要素，而分組研究之目的則在於讓學生藉由各種現場觀察與數位分析工具的應用，進一步探索這些關鍵要素在都市空間形構過程的交互影響過程。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to key theoretical and methodological approaches in urban design. The main content will be delivered through a series of case study discussion and project-based research practice. In specific, the case study is to review and identify key factors shaping the physical environment of cities; while through collaborative research projects, students are expected to engage in a step-by-step process of on-site observation and computational analysis, examining how the factors are interacting with each other.

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 當 Lumiere 兄弟於 1895 年末在巴黎一家咖啡館，舉辦第一場售票的電影放映會時，也正是全球第二次工業革命如火如荼影響人們的生產方式與都市生活之際，透過紀錄當代都市活動與工業化機械美學的短片，他們讓電影技術與城市發展從最初就密不可分，共同作為歌頌現代性的重要媒介。然而，學術界要遲到約莫百年之後，從 1990 年代開始才逐漸形成專門探討電影與城市互動關係的跨學門領域。來自電影研究、都市研究、地理學、歷史學、比較文學、區域研究？？等等領域的學者們，於過去三十數年間替電影城市研究貢獻心力。他們不只是藉由電影分析與相關史料爬梳來重新理解現代性、現代主義與當代都市的發展，也同時關注於二次大戰後流行的黑色電影 (film noir) 如何將當時的都市議題作為其創作主題，後續於 1970 年代起流行的各種近未來反烏托邦電影，又是怎麼進一步藉由預測人類都市的發展來反思當下，創造電影與城市間更為複雜的互文關係。千禧年之後，隨著電影工業與市場的全球化，電影逐漸成為具有都市行銷潛力的大眾媒體，電影場景更逐步發展成一個重要的觀光類型。同時因為電影技術門檻降低與社群媒體的發展，電影也不再只是電影公司或具有天份的獨立電影工作者的遊戲，更多難以分類的影像對都市空間進
description.en: While cinema has been invented over a hundred years and getting influential in shaping people’s perspectives to our environments, the studies of cinematic urbanism have only initiated since 1990s. During the past decades, this interdisciplinary field has developed upon the scholarships of various disciplines, including film and media studies, cultural studies, history, geography, urban studies, etc. This course intends to introduce this still young field through chronologically examining the relationships between cinema and cities, from both being used to celebrate and mediate the modern feelings,to film noir playing a crucial role to criticize and depict urban problems, and to cinematic urban imaginaries boosting tourism and intervening in urban process. Students will learn the theories and methodologies of cinematic urbanism studies, comprehending cinema and different urban spaces as powerful medium that could be manipulated to create, transmit, and perceive certain ideologies.

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程從建築物構築方法和材料特性出發，介紹構法的歷史以及創新應用。內容包括現行工法的運用，以及先進工法的突破。藉由課程引導和案例介紹，培養學生構法知識與應用能力，提升學理與實務上的知能。
description.en: This course starts from building construction methods, introduces the technical history, innovative applications of construction methods. The content includes the application of current construction methods, as well as the breakthrough of advanced construction. Through course guidance and case study, students will cultivate their knowledge of construction method, and enhance their ability in academic theory and practice.

name.zh: 傳統與未來的建築構法

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2. 探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3. 探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4. 學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 建立節能車輛模擬平台，用以評估主系統與次系統之性能與響應關係，並以行車型態為例，分析能量管理系統、引擎、馬達、燃料電池、變速箱與不同儲能電池彼此之特性影響，進一步完成整車調校與控制策略之修正；介紹節能車輛中所使用數學模型與相關理論，進一步連結到學生在實務時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的物理反應現象。
description.en: Establish the energy-saving vehicle simulation platforms are developed in this study to evaluate performance and response between main system and subsystems. The driving cycles are adopted as an example and characteristics among energy management system (EMS), engine, motor, fuel cell, automated manual transmission (AMT) and Energy storage batteries are analyzed for further calibration and modification of control strategy. This course aims at teaching key mathematical models and related theories used in energy-saving vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the physical reaction phenomena observed.

name.zh: 節能車輛模擬與嵌入式系統
name.en: Energy-saving vehicle simulation and embedded system

notes: 日、職車輛所和能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

notes: 機電所、製科所和機械外生班合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink 簡介 2. 控制系統建模 3. 線性時變控制系統分析 4. 可觀測性與可控制性 5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析 6. 曲線擬合與系統建模 7. 控制器設計 8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul Saffo 未來思考與趨勢前瞻，有助於讓每一位同學思索未來社會可能轉變得新趨勢和新的需求。無論同學希望學習或專精的技能為何，如何應用 該技能，提前 選擇一個在未來對社會或個人更可能有所助益的方向練習、實作，不斷繼續前進，才能夠將個人的意義進一步投射至未來的社會價值中；如此一來，未 來社會也將會給給予你應有的報酬。未來思考的課程，將師承奇點大學客座教授，同時也是美國史丹佛大學設計學院特聘助理教授 Paul Saffo 的 Forecasting 課程，內容將有 - 現況觀察、趨勢分析、未來事件辯論、未來趨勢矩陣圖、前瞻思考經典賞析（包含文章與電影） 等。
description.en: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul SaffoFuture Studies & Forecasting will be more and more important skill for every young generation students. What will the future look alike? What is the driving forces pushing us from current to the future? How many pace layers of future arrivals?In this class, we will discuss Stanford consulting prof. Paul Saffo’s Future Studies & Forecasting methods, by – Observing current trends, future event debate, Matrices and Axes of Uncertainty, future mindset developing, etc.

notes: 限 12 人，互動日碩 / 外碩與設計博合開

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1. 介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2. 訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3. 熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 預選限 12 人，互動日碩 / 外碩與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程將以問題導向學習 (Problem-based Learning) 的模式，學習設計思考的五個核心步驟：同理心分析、問題定義、創意發想、雛型發展、驗證評估。並透過實際案例的分析與操作，學習互動設計跨領域創新的方法。本課程的主要目標在於提供學生：1. 了解互動設計的方法與步驟；2. 探討互動設計跨領域創新的方法與操作模式；3. 透過實務案例的操作累積互動設計的執行經驗。
description.en: This course will use Problem-based Learning (PBL) method to teach the five kernel steps of design thinking including the following: Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, and Test. It will also help students in knowing the interdisciplinary innovation methods of interaction design by case studies and real case operation. The main course goals include the following: gain an understanding of the methods and steps of interaction design; explore the methods and operation models for the interdisciplinary innovation of interaction design; and gain the experiences of interaction design by real cases analysis and operation.

notes: 1 週【停開】

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、資料收集、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, data collection, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis. St

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路，進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力，課程內容包念： 1. 電源管理 IC 設計簡介 2. 電壓參考電路設計 3. 低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4. 交換式電壓調整器 5. 交換電容電源轉換器 6. 電池充電技術與應用 7. 設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線 2. 散射參數 3. 微波主動元件 4. 寬頻放大電路 5. 低雜訊放大電路 6. 功率放大器 7. 高穩定振盪器 8. 壓控振盪器 9. 鎖相迴路 10. 混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程包含：1. 散射參數與網路分析儀 2. 頻譜儀介紹 3. 自動化量測 4. 平面化傳輸線 5. 射頻集總元件與阻抗匹配 6. 積體電路封裝 7. 射頻耦合器 8. 射頻濾波器學生能從這門課學習到射頻被動元件的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.S-parameter and Network Analyzer2.Introduction to Spectrum Analyzer3.Automatic Measurement4.Planar Transmission Lines5.RF Lump Elements and Impedance Matching6.IC Package7.RF Coupler8.RF FilterThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF passive circuits from this course.

notes: 電子所日職合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電磁波散射與微波電路組件為主，深入介紹下列議題並討論如何分析、設計、製作與量測：1. 雷達系統之簡介。2. 智慧型車用雷達。3. 表面散射與體積散射。4. 微波遙測。5. 各種高頻轉接電路的設計。 6. 各種高頻平面電路的設計。7. 多端埠平面電路的量測校正技術。
description.en: 1. Introduction to radar systems.2. Intelligent vehicular radar systems.3. Surface scattering and volume scattering.4. Microwave remote sensing.5. Designs for various high-frequency transitions. 6. Designs for various high-frequency planar circuits.7. Measurement and calibration techniques for multi-port planar circuits.

description.zh: 本課程為線性代數的深化與廣化。以理論的深化而言，本課程由高斯消去法談起，解釋四個向量空間，進而說明矩陣的正交性與投影。接著，本課程闡述行列式、特徵值與特徵向量、矩陣的乘冪與指數、頻譜分解，最終收尾於奇異值分解，以此定理統整這一學期的所有內容。以應用的廣化而言，本課程在上述理論說明之外，還會特別介紹科學、工程的應用實例，例如迴歸分析、線性規劃、圖論與網路、主成份分析。
description.en: 1. Introduction - Importance of Linear Algebra2. Ax=b, Matrix, Gaussian Elimination and Application3. Vector Spaces and Linear Equation4. Applications: Graphs and Networks5. Orthogonality and Least Squares6. Applications: Multiple Regression7. Application: Linear Programming 8. Determinant and its Applications9. Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors10. Ak and Difference Equations11. eA and Differential Equations12. Similarity Transformation and Spectral Theorem13. Positive Definite Matrices and Minimum Principles14. Applications: Multivariate Analysis and Principal Component Analysis15. Singular Value Decomposition and its Applications

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: (1) 物聯網概述，(2) 物聯網感知層，(3) 物聯網網路層，(4) 物聯網應用層，(5) 物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6) 無線感測網路 802.15.4 與 ZigBee，(7) 無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID 原理與應用，(9) WSNs 至 IoT，(10) 近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT), (2) IoT: Perception Layer, (3) IoT: Network Layer, (4) IoT: Application Layer, (5) IoT Platform and Could Computing, (6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee, (7) WSN Applications, (8) Principles and Applications of RFID, (9) WSNs to IoT, (10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues.

name.en: Internet of Things and Sensor Networks

notes: 電子所和 AI、資工學程合開

description.zh: 在過去的 60 年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

notes: 電子三四甲乙與電子所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹異質多網多媒體的特性與架構，包含：有線及無線網路的內容介紹，以及整合有線及無線網路成為異質網路的概念，其中將針對 IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH) 教導學生針對異質網路垂直切換的原理及技術。最後，對於多媒體服務技術及原理做介紹，包含：VoIP 服務以及視訊串流服務的介紹，以及如何針對 多種異質網路整合多媒體服務的介紹，藉此提升學生對於新世代異質多網多媒體服務之認識。
description.en: This course introduces the characteristics and architecture of multimedia service in heterogeneous network environment. First, wired and wireless networks, e.g., 3G/3.5G/4G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and other popular wireless access techniques, would be introduced one by one. Then, by describing the theory and technology of IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH), this course would show how to integrate multiple different networks into heterogeneous network environments and how to handoff among them. Finally, regarding multimedia service, VoIP and video streaming services would be taken into consideration. This course would introduce how to provide multimedia services over heterogeneous network environment. Therefore, students can learn the next-generation techniques about multimedia services in heterogeneous network environment from this course.

name.en: Multimedia Service in Heterogeneous Network Environment

notes: 限 30 人，電子所和 AI 學程合開

description.zh: 1. 醫用電子學之基礎。2. 生醫電物理化學之基礎。3. 人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4. 生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5. 醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6. 量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7. 生醫電訊號處理技術。8. 超音波、紅外線、X 光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9. 醫用電子安全規格製訂。10. 醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7 醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12. 中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1. 影像簡介， 2. 顏色空間， 3. 類比影像介面， 4. 數位影像介面， 5. 數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9. 數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

notes: 電子四甲乙、電子所、AI 學程和電資外生所合開

description.en: 1. Patent Protection2. Patent Law3.Patent Search and Reading4. Patent writing and application5. Patent and Innovation6. Patent Examination Procedure7. Patent Strategy8. patent invalidation9. Patent Infringement and Suit10. Special Topics

notes: 綜科 211

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的規劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告製作可如何掌握、發揮互動式媒體的特性，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程亦教導同學如何應用電腦影像（computer imaging）與多媒體的科技與技術，來製作互動式廣告。
description.en: This course is mainly about the planning and principles of interactive advertisement production such as features of interactive media, how can advertisement production control and develop the features of interactive media, as well as the related concepts, technology, and skills needed in order to build, design, develop, and maintain interactive advertisement. Students will learn how to use computer imaging and the technology and techniques of multi-media to make an interactive advertisement.

notes: 限本系生 15 人，日職合開

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 丙丁戊組

description.zh: 課程分為兩主軸，技術成面以感知真實的角度循序討論數位呈現的相關技術。在研究理論方面則介紹相關之現有研究、研究工具、與研究方法，並討論與人互動之感知研究的理論與操作，心理物理學的實驗設計與受試者保護規範之實驗計畫書撰寫。
description.en: This course introduces research methods applicable in the field of design with particular emphasize on the human interaction. Topics including Psychophysics, perceptual study, HCI experiment design, hypothesis testing, and statistical analysis. The aim of this course is to help students in identifying a research topic in the field of interaction design, designing an experiment, and preparing the necessary documents including research proposal and consent form to recruit human subjects to participate in the experiment.

notes: 預選限 12 人，日 / 職碩 / 外碩 / 設計博合開 (英), 光華 409

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的理論、企劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告專案製作之掌握、發揮互動式媒體特性的方法，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程透過課堂中關於互動式廣告原理的講授、相關的個案研究以及文獻導讀使學生能具備互動式廣告之企劃與研究分析能力。學生評量方式包含報告繳交以及分組討論與發表。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theory, planning and techniques of interactive advertisement, which includes the characteristics of interactive media, project management of advertisement, techniques of developing the interactive media, and the way to construct, design, create and maintain the interactive advertisement. The course is preceded by means of lecturing related theory, case studies and literature review to allow students to be capable of interactive advertisement planning and analysis. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 限本系生 15 人，日職合開

description.zh: 數位影像科技的硬體快速進步與影像分析演算法普及化，使得電腦視覺與影像量測技術在工程量測、安全監測，與自動辨識具有相當高的潛力。電腦視覺與影像量測結合影像分析、空間原理、測量原理、誤差分析、機器學習，與工程應用等不同領域，是一個多領域整合的應用科目。本課程訓練學生在電腦視覺與影像量測的基本理論與案例實作的能力。在理論方面，本課程介紹影像原理、空間量測原理、誤差原理、機器學習，以及國內外的發展現況。在實作方面，本課程利用小型結構實驗室，讓同學自行設定小型結構實驗與量測方法，或進而改良或開發分析程式。配合實驗實作與期末專案研究，本課程培養理論認知、資訊技術、實驗實作能力、外語閱讀能力，與簡報與報告編寫熟練度。
description.en: The rapid development and population of digital imaging hardware and algorithms bring high potential of computer vision and image measurement on practical applications. These applications can include but not limited to measurement, structural health monitoring, and safety identification. This course not only introduces the theory of computer vision and image measurement, but also guides students to operate and implement structural experiments and measurement projects. Students are encouraged to bring up the concepts and theories, programming skills, experimental design and implementation, oral presentations, as well as experimental documentation and technical writing ability.

notes: 土木館 208

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業 e 化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

notes: 土木館 205

description.zh: 基本或然率，可靠度概念與定義，不確定性分析，可靠度分析之方法，可靠度導向設計，系統可靠度。
description.en: The analyses of structure reliability   Basic,the concept and definition of reliability uncertain analyses, the method of reliable analyses , reliability -orient design , system reliability.

notes: 土木館 505

description.zh: 1. 結構之彎曲行為 2. 幾何非線性問題介紹 3. 彎矩再分配 4. 非彈性結構分析 5. 塑性分析 6. 韌性設計特別要求 7. 鋼筋混凝土梁之彎曲行為 8. 結構在返覆荷重下之行為
description.en: The behavior of nonlinear structure1 Bending in structure2 Introduction to geometrical-nonlinear problem3 Moment-redistribution 4 Non-elastics structure analysis5 Plasticity analysis6 Flexibility design special request7 The bending of the reinforced concrete in beam

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

notes: 限 15 人 / 土木館 205

description.zh: 1. 台灣海域的地質概述，2. 海域的工程地質調查，3. 不同環境下的風場結構，4. 海流特性的調查與評估，5. 波浪特性的調查與評估，6. 鋼結構施工，7. 風機之運輸與安裝，8. 灌漿工程，9. 離岸變電站與基礎，10. 風機葉片之製作、安裝、維護與維修 11. 海纜鋪設工程 12. 構材防蝕技術 13. 沖刷防治 14 基樁鑽掘與噪音降檢
description.en: 1. Offshore geology description nearby Taiwan, 2. Offshore geotechnical site investigation, 3. Wind farm structures under different environmental conditions, 4. Investigation and evaluation of current properties, 5. Investigation and evaluation of wave properties, 6. Construction of steel structure, 7. Transportation and installation of wind turbines, 8. Grouting engineering, 9. Offshore substation and foundation , 10. Fabrication, installation, maintenance and repair of wind turbine blades, 11. Laying procedures of subsea power cables, 12. Corrosion-proof technologies, 13. Scouring-proof technologies, 14 Pile drilling and noise reduction

name.zh: 離岸風機工程調查與施工
name.en: Engineering investigation and construction for offshore wind turbines

notes: 工程學院 (大) 及防災所合開 (研究所 30 人)/ 顧寶鼎老師

description.zh: 生態工法的概念和原則近年來廣泛地引介和應用在各種的土木工程領域中，包括河溪、坡地、都市和交通建設等，而由於土石流和坡地災害的頻繁發生，因此在山坡地應用生態工法遂成為重要的課題，也逐漸成為應該提供給土木系學生，使其瞭解相關基礎知識的重要課程，因此在本導論課程中，我們將介紹如何將生物地工技術和土壤生物工程（Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering）應用在邊坡穩定和侵蝕控制上，使學生認識並瞭解目前在邊坡保護上結合工程力學分析、植物學知識和實際案例應用的發展，並藉此介紹國內外常用的邊坡穩定工法，以及結合不同傳統擋土設施的可行方式。本課程無先修課程限制，建議研究所和大學部高年級同學選修。
description.en: The concept and principles of ecological engineering has been widely adopted by various disciplines of traditional civil engineering,including hydraulic engineering, slope stabilization, urban infrastructures, and transportation engineering.  Among them, slope stabilization is a particularly important topic because of thefrequent occurrence of debris flows and landslides in Taiwan, and thus it becomes necessary to provide such a course to familiarize students with this important field.  In this introductory course, we will explain the fundamental concepts of biotechnical and soil bioengineering and how to apply them to the slope stabilization anderosion control.  An interdisciplinary approach that combines the knowledge and understanding of both mechanical design and vegetation properties will be emphasized.  The results can be integrated with traditional retaining structures to create more economical and eco-friendly slope stabilization systems.  No prerequisite.

name.en: Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering Slope Stabilization

notes: 研究所 14 人 / 土木館 308

description.zh: 工程進度規劃與控制是營建工程進行專案管理時之重要知識與技術，此課程包含 ADM 及 PDM 網圖、要徑分析、PERT 分析、趕工計畫、及實獲值分析等理論知識，同時也會結合工程進度控管軟體應用技術。本課程目標意在培養同學具備工程進度規劃與控制觀念知識，並透過專案練習及軟體操作讓同學具備工程進度規劃與控制能力。
description.en: Construction project scheduling and control is necessary and important for effective management of construction projects. The course introduces the major concepts and methods for construction project schedule scheduling and control. The course includes plan and analysis of ADM and PDM networks, analysis of critical paths,, plan for catch-up, introduction of PERT and earned value analysis methods. The course will teach students the major concept and methods of construction project scheduling and control. Furthermore, the course will enhance students abilities and techniques integrated with project practices and project schedule software uses.

notes: 管理組必選 / 土木館 208

description.zh: 本課程係以營建工程管理之架構為主要核心，進階探討工程執行生命週期中之重點管理工作，並透過相關案例之研討，探討工程實務運作上之問題及管理對策。課程內容主要包含營建工程專案管理概念，營建管理方法，工程執行方式與管理策略，工程契約管理，工程爭議處理，工程界面管理等內容。
description.en: 英課名：Construct manage special discuss      1.Manage summary and make tactics.      2.Investigation manage key element analyze.      3.Engineering economy and financial affairs manage.      4.Construction procreation might analyze.      5.Construction risk manage.      6.Value engineering.      7.Engineering contract analyze.      8.Engineering disputes handle.      9.Construct automation and industrialization.     10.BOT and new way of purchasing mode.     11.Construct electron business affairs and construct         information manage.     12.Electric network technology.     13.Engineering resource manage.     14.Engineering insurance and guarantee.     15.Construct affairs administration.     16.Engineering plan proposal and analyze.     17.Communicate and crisis handle.     18.Safety sanitation, environmental protection and         neighbor loss mange.     19.Engineering laws and regulations.     20.Construct investigation manage.

notes: 土木館 202

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測 (溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測 (水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線) 及地下水 (土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

notes: 土木館 308

description.zh: 這是一門土研所的選修課，由內容包括：地震學及地震工程，強地動，振動時最高粒子速度之預測，自然頻率與阻尼之估計與量測，地盤反應分析，基地影響與設計地盤震動，打樁振動分析與永久位移，微振動量測與分析，爆炸設計等。課程中並學習使用軟體 Matlab 作為分析計算之主要工具。
description.en: This course is optional to all postgraduate students. The content of lectures:Seismology and earthquakes, Strong fround motion, prediction of peak particle vibrations, microvibrations, blast design.

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management.
