description.zh: 本課程將專注於創新產品與混合實境的設計研究實務，期望透過虛實整合與使用者經驗的核心概念，應用研究方法深入探究設計問題與使用者經驗中的痛點，探討實體端產品設計和虛擬端的服務設計之各種實務應用，進而透過設計方法與軟硬體技術落實創新概念，最終達到設計出符合與滿足使用者在未來生活中的各種設計服務與體驗。
description.en: This course will focus on the design research case study of innovative products and mixed reality. It is expected that through the core concepts of virtual-real integration and user experience, it will apply research methods to deeply explore design problems and pain points in user experience and explore physical product design and virtual reality. We will integrate various possibilities of service design with industry case study. Then, we intend to utilize the implemented innovative concept by design methods, software, and hardware technologies to achieve the design services and experiences that meet and satisfy users in future life.

name.zh: 產品與混合實境設計研究 (二)
name.en: Product and Mixed Reality Design Research (2)

notes: 日職合開，英語授課

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術。本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題：1. 近代光電量測系統與技術 2. 量測統計原理 3. 量測信號處理 4. 三次元座標量測系統與技術 5. 雷射干涉系統與技術 6. 影像量測系統與技術 7. 微奈米量測系統與技術 - 干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術 8. 微奈米量測系統與技術 -- 掃瞄探針顯微鏡 (SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9. 奈米粉體量測系統與技術 10. 量測實驗 11. 小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

notes: 新進教師 (陳)

description.zh: 年來，在世博和花博兩大活動的帶動下，讓跨領域整合的「展示科技」成為新的研究焦點；新型態的展示手法，可以被應用在博物館及展場、商業空間、互動式機台、行銷活動和數位藝術。依照需求的不同，可以把展示科技分成『會場環境』和『觀眾體驗』兩類，前者就像是基礎建設、活動系統和周邊系統，而後者則是為觀眾創造全新體驗。而本課程則是為了掌握產業界相關的技術新知、學術界的專業研究與藝文界的脈動，本課程將廣邀展示科技的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就展場設計、互動技術、視覺呈現等面向，翻轉你與展示物的關係，體現創意展現的軟實力。
description.en: The promotion of Expo and Flora Expo in recent years makes the display technology a new focus in study. New pattern of display techniques can be applied to museum, exhibition, commercial space, interactive machinery, marketing and digital art. Depending on different needs, the Display Technology can be divided into two categories, which are "the environment of exhibition" and "the experience of audience". The former is like fundamental constructions, movable system, and peripheral system; the latter is like building a new and fresh experience for the audience. To understand science and technological information from business field, researches from academic field and issues from arts field, this course should be invited the expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion.

notes: 限 12 人

description.zh: 1. 無線傳輸技術之效能評估 2.GSM 系統之分析與模擬 3.IS-95 CDMA 系統之分析與模擬 4. 第三代行動通訊系統之分析與模擬 5. 定位機制之探討 6. 統計通道模擬 7. 定點通道模擬
description.en: 1.Performance Evaluation of Wireless Transmission Techniques2.Analysis and Simulation of GSM System3.Analysis and Simulation of IS-95 CDMA System4.Analysis and Simulation of 3G Systems5.Positioning6.Statistic Channel Modeling 7.Sight Specific Channel modeling

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程呼應技職再造的創新創業趨勢，以具體個案討論為中心，讓同學有機會運用所學、解決實際的法律問題。適合對如何透過智財法律推動知識經濟、創新創業有興趣的同學。同學可以透過本課程，進一步了解創新創業現實中可能面臨的問題、並練習提供解決策略。
description.en: This course will focus on the intellectual property legal issues regarding innovation and entrepreneurship by drawing real cases for analysis and discussion. Students will have opportunities to further understand the legal practice in IP area by taking part in solving real cases with the help of the course tutor. It is recommended for those who are equipped with a general understanding of IP laws or are strongly interested in this subject.

name.zh: 創新創業智財法律專題研究
name.en: Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Intellectual Property Law

description.zh: 本課程所定義的文化產業包括音樂產業、電視產業、電影產業、劇場產業和其他表演藝術有關的產業。這些產業區塊都存在相關的智慧財產權議題，例如所有權、權利轉讓、合理使用、侵權行為、契約爭議等等。本課程將透過法院判決的選讀與產業案例研究來讓學生認識文化產業的智慧財產權議題。學生將被要求參與討論。評分方式包括課堂參與和報告。
description.en: The scope of the cultural industry covered by this course includes the music industry, film industry, television industry, theatre industry, and other industries related to performing arts. Intellectual property issues do exist in these industrial sectors. The issues include ownership, title transfer, fair use, infringement, contract dispute, and so on. This course is intended to expose students to various IP issues in the cultural industry through studying court decisions and discussing industrial case studies. Students are required to participate in discussion. The grading policy is based on class participation and essay paper.

name.zh: 文化產業與智慧財產權
name.en: Cultural Industry and Intellectual Property Rights

description.zh: 「原住民族傳統智慧創作保護專題研究」將協助學生理解原住民族的文化自治理論下、原住民族傳統智慧創作保護的法規架構；並由原住民族傳統智慧保護的案例出發，透過個案引導學生了解原住民族傳統智慧保護的理論與實務。最後安排可供具體探討與模擬練習的原住民族傳統智慧保護標的，幫助修課學生從歷史與文化自治的座標出發，建立原住民族傳統智慧保護的法律概念與實務基礎，增加智財法律訓練的文化視野。
description.en: This course will equip students with both theoretical and practice knowledge about the Indigenous People Traditional Intellectual Creation Protection Act. The Act is anchored in the autonomy theory in the cultural context but share many characteristics with other IP laws. By learning this Act, it opens the gate for students to explore the history and culture developments of indigenous people, also help students explore more cultural aspect of intellectual property laws.

name.zh: 原民傳智創作保護專題研究
name.en: Protection of Indigenous People Traditional Intellectual Creation

notes: 1 週【停開】

description.zh: 本課程呼應技職再造的創新創業趨勢，以具體個案討論為中心，讓同學有機會運用所學、解決實際的法律問題。適合對如何透過智財法律推動知識經濟、創新創業有興趣的同學。同學可以透過本課程，進一步了解創新創業現實中可能面臨的問題、並練習提供解決策略。

Students will have opportunities to further understand the legal practice in IP area by taking part in solving real cases with the help of the course tutor. It is recommended for those who are equipped with a general understanding of IP laws or are strongly interested in this subject.

name.zh: 創新創業智財法律專題研究
name.en: Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Intellectual Property Law

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹人工智慧的基本概念與發展，並激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、人工智慧的製造業應用、人工智慧的服務業應用。
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic concepts and applications of artificial intelligence and to inspire students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learning, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industrial applications of artificial intelligence, and services applications of artificial intelligence.

notes: 管理博班和工管所合開

description.zh: 本課程教授系統分析之模擬方法應用於能源動力系統之穩態與動態分析 (malab)。內容包括能源系統個元件之特性分析與數學模型介紹，系統元件包括；壓縮機、渦輪機、熱交換器、與質子交換膜燃料電池系統。授課單元如下；1. 數值方法介紹 2. 能源系統元件數學模型與程式撰寫壓縮機   渦輪機   熱交換器 3. 能源系統分析範例；燃料電池系統分析流道 model、氣體擴散層 model、燃料電池質傳與電化學傳輸與程式範例
description.en: The course is a system analysis method for performing steady-state and dynamic system simulations of lumped component system (matlab). These methods are essentially a numerical analysis; the course teach student to set up various system composed of; compressor, turbine, heat exchanger, reformer and fuel cell system. Course lectures are listed as:1.Numerical method 2.System components modeling Compressor   Turbine   Heat exchanger3.Case study of energy system; fuel cell system analysisFlow modeling, GDL model, mass & charge transport and programing

description.zh: 設計是一個相當多元的領域，是技術的化身、美學的表現和文化的象徵。它是社會、經濟、技術、藝術、心理學和生理學的結合。本課程旨在構建學生對設計原理和理論的認識，提高學生對美感和設計作品的鑑賞能力，並為他們提供專業術語。這些知識構成了幫助年輕從業者實現其藝術目標並在高專業水平上執行項目工作的核心。本課程基於對現代設計行業的概述，期望建立一個關於設計思維主題的全景視角。
description.en: Design is a quite multiplex domain, technical incarnation, esthetics performance and cultural symbol. And it is the union of the social, economics, technology, arts, psychology, and physiology. The course aims to structure students’ knowledge about the principles and theories of design, improve their abilities to appreciate the aesthetic sense and design works, and provide them with professional terminology. This knowledge constitutes the core which helps young practitioners to attain their artistic objectives and perform project work on a high professional level. This course is based on an overview of the modern design industry, expect to establish a panorama perspective on the subject of design thinking.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 設計是一個相當多元的領域，是技術的化身、美學的表現和文化的象徵。它是社會、經濟、技術、藝術、心理學和生理學的結合。本課程旨在構建學生對設計原理和理論的認識，提高學生對美感和設計作品的鑑賞能力，並為他們提供專業術語。這些知識構成了幫助年輕從業者實現其藝術目標並在高專業水平上執行項目工作的核心。本課程基於對現代設計行業的概述，期望建立一個關於設計思維主題的全景視角。
description.en: Design is a quite multiplex domain, technical incarnation, esthetics performance and cultural symbol. And it is the union of the social, economics, technology, arts, psychology, and physiology. The course aims to structure students’ knowledge about the principles and theories of design, improve their abilities to appreciate the aesthetic sense and design works, and provide them with professional terminology. This knowledge constitutes the core which helps young practitioners to attain their artistic objectives and perform project work on a high professional level. This course is based on an overview of the modern design industry, expect to establish a panorama perspective on the subject of design thinking.

notes: 日職合開，英語授課

description.zh: 本課程目標旨在介紹計算智能、軟性計算與演化計算的相關演算法與進階應用。內容包括：爬山法與模擬退火、基因演算法、粒子群優演算法、蜂群演算法等相關內容。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the computational intelligence, soft computing, evolutionary algorithm, relative algorithms and their applications. The course covers the subjects on Hill-Climbing Algorithm, Simulated Annealing, Genetic Algorithm, Particle Swarm Optimization, Artificial Bee Colony and so on.

notes: 創新 AI、人工智慧學位學程和資工所合開

description.zh: 協助學員在完成訓練後：1. 對半導體機台的設計原理、操作與預防保養有基礎的概念。2. 對半導體設備實務工作有初步的了解。3. 能結合學校所學理論與產業實務。
description.en: After completing the training, the trainees will: 1.Know the basic concept of the design principle, operation and preventive maintenance about semiconductor tools.2.Have a preliminary understanding of what an equipment engineer does in Fab.3.Be able to combine the theories learned from the school with industrial practices.

notes: 第一梯次 - 請依行前須知所示選課

description.zh: 協助學員在完成訓練後：1. 對半導體設備元件原理與作用有基礎的了解 2. 對半導體設備實務工作有初步的了解 3. 能結合學校所學理論與產業實務。
description.en: After completing the training, the trainees will: 1.Have a basic understanding of the principles and functions of semiconductor equipment components.2.Have a preliminary understanding of what an equipment engineer does in Fab.3.Be able to combine the theories learned from the school with industrial practices.

name.en: Introduction of Equipment Components in Semiconductor

notes: 第一梯次 - 請依行前須知所示選課

description.zh: 協助學員在完成訓練後：1. 對半導體機台的設計原理、操作與預防保養有基礎的概念。2. 對半導體設備實務工作有初步的了解。3. 能結合學校所學理論與產業實務。
description.en: After completing the training, the trainees will: 1.Know the basic concept of the design principle, operation and preventive maintenance about semiconductor tools.2.Have a preliminary understanding of what an equipment engineer does in Fab.3.Be able to combine the theories learned from the school with industrial practices.

notes: 第二梯次 - 請依行前須知所示選課

description.zh: 協助學員在完成訓練後：1. 對半導體設備元件原理與作用有基礎的了解 2. 對半導體設備實務工作有初步的了解 3. 能結合學校所學理論與產業實務。
description.en: After completing the training, the trainees will: 1.Have a basic understanding of the principles and functions of semiconductor equipment components.2.Have a preliminary understanding of what an equipment engineer does in Fab.3.Be able to combine the theories learned from the school with industrial practices.

name.en: Introduction of Equipment Components in Semiconductor

notes: 第二梯次 - 請依行前須知所示選課

description.zh: 1. 數位影像處理的基礎 2. 影像的轉換 3. 影像的加強 4. 影像的復原 5. 彩色影像的處理 6. 影像的壓縮 7. 影像的分割與特徵抽取 8. 影像的表達及描述 9. 影像的辨認與解釋 10. 導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

notes: 2 週，創新 AI、人工智慧學位學程、電子所和光電所合開【停開】

description.zh: C 語言為開發作業系統、嵌入式系統、通訊協定等程式最常使用的程式語言，本課程主要教導 C 程式語言於實務上之應用，課程內容主要包括：進階指標使用、指標與陣列、指標與資料結構、Pointer-to-pointer、指標函式、Callback function、Bitwise operation 應用等，除了於 PC 上撰寫程式練習之外，亦會有 case study 來輔助教學以及了解 C 語言的使用技巧，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來模擬 CPU 排程與記憶體管理等相關作業系統底層程式。
description.en: The C programming language is commonly used to implement operation systems, embedded systems, and communication protocols. The object of this course is to teach how to apply the C programming language to develop real application systems. The contents of this course include advanced pointer usage, pointer and array, pointer and data structure, pointer-to-pointer, function pointer, callback functions, bitwise operations, and so on. In addition to practice on PC, this course also offers case studies for better understanding. Students will also be required to implement emulators to simulate OS lower level operations, e.g., CPU scheduling and memory management.

name.zh: 進階 C 語言實務

notes: 創新 AI、人工智慧學位學程和電子所合開
